02901 
02912 void QCPLegend::setSelectable(const SelectableParts &selectable)
02913 {
02914   mSelectable = selectable;
02915 }
02916 
02938 void QCPLegend::setSelected(const SelectableParts &selected)
02939 {
02940   if (mSelected != selected)
02941   {
02942     if (!selected.testFlag(spItems) && mSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // some items are selected, but new selection state doesn't contain spItems, so deselect them
02943     {
02944       for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); ++i)
02945         mItems.at(i)->setSelected(false);
02946       mSelected = selected;
02947       // not necessary to emit selectionChanged here because this will have happened for the last setSelected(false) on mItems already, via updateSelectionState()
02948     } else
02949     {
02950       mSelected = selected;
02951       emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
02952     }
02953   }
02954 }
02955 
02962 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
02963 {
02964   mSelectedBorderPen = pen;
02965 }
02966 
02972 void QCPLegend::setSelectedIconBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
02973 {
02974   mSelectedIconBorderPen = pen;
02975 }
02976 
02983 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
02984 {
02985   mSelectedBrush = brush;
02986 }
02987 
02995 void QCPLegend::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
02996 {
02997   mSelectedFont = font;
02998   for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); ++i)
02999     mItems.at(i)->setSelectedFont(font);
03000 }
03001 
03009 void QCPLegend::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color)
03010 {
03011   mSelectedTextColor = color;
03012   for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); ++i)
03013     mItems.at(i)->setSelectedTextColor(color);
03014 }
03015 
03021 QCPAbstractLegendItem *QCPLegend::item(int index) const
03022 {
03023   if (index >= 0 && index < mItems.size())
03024     return mItems[index];
03025   else
03026     return 0;
03027 }
03028 
03035 QCPPlottableLegendItem *QCPLegend::itemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
03036 {
03037   for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); ++i)
03038   {
03039     if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *pli = qobject_cast<QCPPlottableLegendItem*>(mItems.at(i)))
03040     {
03041       if (pli->plottable() == plottable)
03042         return pli;
03043     }
03044   }
03045   return 0;
03046 }
03047 
03052 int QCPLegend::itemCount() const
03053 {
03054   return mItems.size();
03055 }
03056 
03060 bool QCPLegend::hasItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item) const
03061 {
03062   return mItems.contains(item);
03063 }
03064 
03071 bool QCPLegend::hasItemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
03072 {
03073   return itemWithPlottable(plottable);
03074 }
03075 
03083 bool QCPLegend::addItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
03084 {
03085   if (!mItems.contains(item))
03086   {
03087     mItems.append(item);
03088     return true;
03089   } else
03090     return false;
03091 }
03092 
03100 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(int index)
03101 {
03102   if (index >= 0 && index < mItems.size())
03103   {
03104     mItemBoundingBoxes.remove(mItems.at(index));
03105     delete mItems.at(index);
03106     mItems.removeAt(index);
03107     return true;
03108   } else
03109     return false;
03110 }
03111 
03120 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
03121 {
03122   return removeItem(mItems.indexOf(item));
03123 }
03124 
03128 void QCPLegend::clearItems()
03129 {
03130   qDeleteAll(mItems);
03131   mItems.clear();
03132   mItemBoundingBoxes.clear();
03133 }
03134 
03135 
03142 QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem *> QCPLegend::selectedItems() const
03143 {
03144   QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem*> result;
03145   for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); ++i)
03146   {
03147     if (mItems.at(i)->selected())
03148       result.append(mItems.at(i));
03149   }
03150   return result;
03151 }
03152 
03158 void  QCPLegend::reArrange()
03159 {
03160   if (mAutoSize)
03161   {
03162     calculateAutoSize();
03163   }
03164   calculateAutoPosition();
03165 }
03166 
03172 bool QCPLegend::selectTestLegend(const QPointF &pos) const
03173 {
03174   return QRect(mPosition, mSize).contains(pos.toPoint());
03175 }
03176 
03183 QCPAbstractLegendItem *QCPLegend::selectTestItem(const QPoint pos) const
03184 {
03185   QMap<QCPAbstractLegendItem*, QRect>::const_iterator it;
03186   for (it = mItemBoundingBoxes.constBegin(); it != mItemBoundingBoxes.constEnd(); ++it)
03187   {
03188     if (it.value().contains(pos) && mItems.contains(it.key()))
03189       return it.key();
03190   }
03191   return 0;
03192 }
03193 
03206 void QCPLegend::updateSelectionState()
03207 {
03208   bool hasSelections = false;
03209   for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); ++i)
03210   {
03211     if (mItems.at(i)->selected())
03212     {
03213       hasSelections = true;
03214       break;
03215     }
03216   }
03217   
03218   // in the following we don't use setSelected because it would cause unnecessary
03219   // logic looping through items if spItems isn't set in the new state. (look at setSelected and you'll understand)
03220   if (hasSelections && !mSelected.testFlag(spItems))
03221   {
03222     mSelected |= spItems;
03223     emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
03224   } else if (!hasSelections && mSelected.testFlag(spItems))
03225   {
03226     mSelected &= ~spItems;
03227     emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
03228   }
03229 }
03230 
03244 bool QCPLegend::handleLegendSelection(QMouseEvent *event, bool additiveSelection, bool &modified)
03245 {
03246   modified = false;
03247   bool selectionFound = false;
03248   
03249   if (event && selectTestLegend(event->pos())) // clicked inside legend somewhere
03250   {
03251     QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = selectTestItem(event->pos());
03252     if (selectable().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems) && ali && ali->selectable()) // items shall be selectable and item ali was clicked 
03253     {
03254       selectionFound = true;
03255       // deselect legend box:
03256       if (!additiveSelection && selected().testFlag(QCPLegend::spLegendBox) && selectable().testFlag(QCPLegend::spLegendBox))
03257         setSelected(selected() & ~QCPLegend::spLegendBox);
03258       // first select clicked item:
03259       if (!ali->selected() || additiveSelection) // if additive selection, we toggle selection on and off per click
03260       {
03261         modified = true;
03262         ali->setSelected(!ali->selected());
03263       }
03264       // finally, deselect all other items (if we had deselected all first, the selectionChanged signal of QCPLegend might have been emitted twice):
03265       if (!additiveSelection)
03266       {
03267         for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
03268         {
03269           if (item(i) != ali && item(i)->selected() && item(i)->selectable())
03270           {
03271             modified = true;
03272             item(i)->setSelected(false);
03273           }
03274         }
03275       }
03276     } else // no specific item clicked or items not selectable
03277     {
03278       // if items actually were selectable, this means none were clicked, deselect them:
03279       if (selectable().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems) && selected().testFlag(QCPLegend::spItems) && !additiveSelection)
03280       {
03281         for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
03282         {
03283           if (item(i)->selectable())
03284             item(i)->setSelected(false);
03285         }
03286         modified = true;
03287       }
03288       // if legend box is selectable, select it:
03289       if (selectable().testFlag(QCPLegend::spLegendBox))
03290       {
03291         if (!selected().testFlag(QCPLegend::spLegendBox) || additiveSelection)
03292         {
03293           selectionFound = true;
03294           setSelected(selected() ^ QCPLegend::spLegendBox); // xor because we always toggle
03295           modified = true;
03296         }
03297       }
03298     }
03299   } else if (selected() != QCPLegend::spNone && selectable() != QCPLegend::spNone && !additiveSelection) // legend not clicked, deselect it if selectable allows that (and all child items)
03300   {
03301     // only deselect parts that are allowed to be changed by user according to selectable()
03302     // deselect child items (and automatically removes spItems from selected state of legend, if last item gets deselected):
03303     if (selectable().testFlag(spItems)) 
03304     {
03305       for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
03306       {
03307         if (item(i)->selected() && item(i)->selectable())
03308         {
03309           item(i)->setSelected(false);
03310           modified = true;
03311         }
03312       }
03313     }
03314     // only deselect parts that are allowed to be changed (are selectable). Don't forcibly remove
03315     // spItems, because some selected items might not be selectable, i.e. allowed to be deselected
03316     // by user interaction. If that's not the case, spItems will have been removed from selected()
03317     // state in previous loop by individual setSelected(false) calls on the items anyway.
03318     QCPLegend::SelectableParts newState = selected() & ~(selectable()&~spItems);
03319     if (newState != selected())
03320     {
03321       setSelected(newState);
03322       modified = true;
03323     }
03324   }
03325   
03326   return selectionFound;
03327 }
03328 
03341 void QCPLegend::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
03342 {
03343   applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegend);
03344 }
03345 
03351 QPen QCPLegend::getBorderPen() const
03352 {
03353   return mSelected.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBorderPen : mBorderPen;
03354 }
03355 
03361 QBrush QCPLegend::getBrush() const
03362 {
03363   return mSelected.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
03364 }
03365 
03370 void QCPLegend::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
03371 {
03372   painter->setBrush(getBrush());
03373   painter->setPen(getBorderPen());
03374   // draw background rect:
03375   painter->drawRect(QRect(mPosition, mSize));
03376   // draw legend items:
03377   painter->setClipRect(QRect(mPosition, mSize).adjusted(1, 1, 0, 0));
03378   painter->setPen(QPen());
03379   painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
03380   int currentTop = mPosition.y()+mPaddingTop;
03381   for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); ++i)
03382   {
03383     QSize itemSize = mItems.at(i)->size(QSize(mSize.width(), 0));
03384     QRect itemRect = QRect(QPoint(mPosition.x()+mPaddingLeft, currentTop), itemSize);
03385     mItemBoundingBoxes.insert(mItems.at(i), itemRect);
03386     painter->save();
03387     mItems.at(i)->applyAntialiasingHint(painter);
03388     mItems.at(i)->draw(painter, itemRect);
03389     painter->restore();
03390     currentTop += itemSize.height()+mItemSpacing;
03391   }
03392 }
03393 
03400 void QCPLegend::calculateAutoSize()
03401 {
03402   int width = mMinimumSize.width()-mPaddingLeft-mPaddingRight; // start with minimum width and only expand from there
03403   int currentTop;
03404   bool repeat = true;
03405   int repeatCount = 0;
03406   while (repeat && repeatCount < 3) // repeat until we find self-consistent width (usually 2 runs)
03407   {
03408     repeat = false;
03409     currentTop = mPaddingTop;
03410     for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); ++i)
03411     {
03412       QSize s = mItems.at(i)->size(QSize(width, 0));
03413       currentTop += s.height();
03414       if (i < mItems.size()-1) // vertical spacer for all but last item
03415         currentTop += mItemSpacing;
03416       if (width < s.width())
03417       {
03418         width = s.width();
03419         repeat = true; // changed width, so need a new run with new width to let other items adapt their height to that new width
03420       }
03421     }
03422     repeatCount++;
03423   }
03424   if (repeat)
03425     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "hit repeat limit for iterative width calculation";
03426   currentTop += mPaddingBottom;
03427   width += mPaddingLeft+mPaddingRight;
03428   
03429   mSize.setWidth(width);
03430   if (currentTop > mMinimumSize.height())
03431     mSize.setHeight(currentTop);
03432   else
03433     mSize.setHeight(mMinimumSize.height());
03434 }
03435 
03440 void QCPLegend::calculateAutoPosition()
03441 {
03442   switch (mPositionStyle)
03443   {
03444     case psTopLeft:
03445       mPosition = mParentPlot->mAxisRect.topLeft() + QPoint(mMarginLeft, mMarginTop); break;
03446     case psTop:
03447       mPosition = mParentPlot->mAxisRect.topLeft() + QPoint(mParentPlot->mAxisRect.width()/2.0-mSize.width()/2.0, mMarginTop); break;
03448     case psTopRight:
03449       mPosition = mParentPlot->mAxisRect.topRight() + QPoint(-mMarginRight-mSize.width(), mMarginTop); break;
03450     case psRight:
03451       mPosition = mParentPlot->mAxisRect.topRight() + QPoint(-mMarginRight-mSize.width(), mParentPlot->mAxisRect.height()/2.0-mSize.height()/2.0); break;
03452     case psBottomRight:
03453       mPosition = mParentPlot->mAxisRect.bottomRight() + QPoint(-mMarginRight-mSize.width(), -mMarginBottom-mSize.height()); break;
03454     case psBottom:
03455       mPosition = mParentPlot->mAxisRect.bottomLeft() + QPoint(mParentPlot->mAxisRect.width()/2.0-mSize.width()/2.0, -mMarginBottom-mSize.height()); break;
03456     case psBottomLeft:
03457       mPosition = mParentPlot->mAxisRect.bottomLeft() + QPoint(mMarginLeft, -mMarginBottom-mSize.height()); break;
03458     case psLeft:
03459       mPosition = mParentPlot->mAxisRect.topLeft() + QPoint(mMarginLeft, mParentPlot->mAxisRect.height()/2.0-mSize.height()/2.0); break;
03460     case psManual: break;
03461   }
03462 }
03463 
03464 
03465 // ================================================================================
03466 // =================== QCPAxis
03467 // ================================================================================
03468 
03477 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
03478 
03485 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
03486 /* start of documentation of signals */
03487 
03516 /* end of documentation of signals */
03517 
03521 QCPAxis::QCPAxis(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, AxisType type) :
03522   QCPLayerable(parentPlot)
03523 {
03524   mLowestVisibleTick = 0;
03525   mHighestVisibleTick = -1;
03526   mGrid = new QCPGrid(this);
03527   setAxisType(type);
03528   setAxisRect(parentPlot->axisRect()); 
03529   setScaleType(stLinear);
03530   setScaleLogBase(10);
03531   
03532   setAntialiased(false);
03533   setRange(0, 5);
03534   setRangeReversed(false);
03535   
03536   setTicks(true);
03537   setTickStep(1);
03538   setAutoTickCount(6);
03539   setAutoTicks(true);
03540   setAutoTickLabels(true);
03541   setAutoTickStep(true);
03542   setTickLabelFont(parentPlot->font());
03543   setTickLabelColor(Qt::black);
03544   setTickLength(5);
03545   setTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap));
03546   setTickLabels(true);
03547   setTickLabelType(ltNumber);
03548   setTickLabelRotation(0);
03549   setDateTimeFormat("hh:mm:ss\ndd.MM.yy");
03550   setNumberFormat("gbd");
03551   setNumberPrecision(6);
03552   setLabel("");
03553   setLabelFont(parentPlot->font());
03554   setLabelColor(Qt::black);
03555   
03556   setAutoSubTicks(true);
03557   setSubTickCount(4);
03558   setSubTickLength(2);
03559   setSubTickPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap));
03560   setBasePen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::SquareCap));
03561   
03562   setSelected(spNone);
03563   setSelectable(spAxis | spTickLabels | spAxisLabel);
03564   QFont selTickLabelFont = tickLabelFont();
03565   selTickLabelFont.setBold(true);
03566   setSelectedTickLabelFont(selTickLabelFont);
03567   QFont selLabelFont = labelFont();
03568   selLabelFont.setBold(true);
03569   setSelectedLabelFont(selLabelFont);
03570   setSelectedTickLabelColor(Qt::blue);
03571   setSelectedLabelColor(Qt::blue);
03572   QPen blueThickPen(Qt::blue, 2);
03573   setSelectedBasePen(blueThickPen);
03574   setSelectedTickPen(blueThickPen);
03575   setSelectedSubTickPen(blueThickPen);
03576   
03577   setPadding(0);
03578   if (type == atTop)
03579   {
03580     setTickLabelPadding(3);
03581     setLabelPadding(6);
03582   } else if (type == atRight)
03583   {
03584     setTickLabelPadding(7);
03585     setLabelPadding(12);
03586   } else if (type == atBottom)
03587   {
03588     setTickLabelPadding(3);
03589     setLabelPadding(3);
03590   } else if (type == atLeft)
03591   {
03592     setTickLabelPadding(5);
03593     setLabelPadding(10);
03594   }
03595 }
03596 
03597 QCPAxis::~QCPAxis()
03598 {
03599   delete mGrid;
03600 }
03601 
03602 /* No documentation as it is a property getter */
03603 QString QCPAxis::numberFormat() const
03604 {
03605   QString result;
03606   result.append(mNumberFormatChar);
03607   if (mNumberBeautifulPowers)
03608   {
03609     result.append("b");
03610     if (mNumberMultiplyCross)
03611       result.append("c");
03612   }
03613   return result;
03614 }
03615 
03622 void QCPAxis::setAxisType(AxisType type)
03623 {
03624   mAxisType = type;
03625   mOrientation = (type == atBottom || type == atTop) ? Qt::Horizontal : Qt::Vertical;
03626 }
03627 
03635 void QCPAxis::setAxisRect(const QRect &rect)
03636 {
03637   mAxisRect = rect;
03638 }
03639 
03653 void QCPAxis::setScaleType(ScaleType type)
03654 {
03655   mScaleType = type;
03656   if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
03657     mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
03658 }
03659 
03667 void QCPAxis::setScaleLogBase(double base)
03668 {
03669   if (base > 1)
03670   {
03671     mScaleLogBase = base;
03672     mScaleLogBaseLogInv = 1.0/qLn(mScaleLogBase); // buffer for faster baseLog() calculation
03673   } else
03674     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid logarithmic scale base (must be greater 1):" << base;
03675 }
03676 
03685 void QCPAxis::setRange(const QCPRange &range)
03686 {
03687   if (range.lower == mRange.lower && range.upper == mRange.upper)
03688     return;
03689   
03690   if (!QCPRange::validRange(range)) return;
03691   if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
03692   {
03693     mRange = range.sanitizedForLogScale();
03694   } else
03695   {
03696     mRange = range.sanitizedForLinScale();
03697   }
03698   emit rangeChanged(mRange);
03699 }
03700 
03711 void QCPAxis::setSelectable(const SelectableParts &selectable)
03712 {
03713   mSelectable = selectable;
03714 }
03715 
03732 void QCPAxis::setSelected(const SelectableParts &selected)
03733 {
03734   if (mSelected != selected)
03735   {
03736     mSelected = selected;
03737     emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
03738   }
03739 }
03740 
03749 void QCPAxis::setRange(double lower, double upper)
03750 {
03751   if (lower == mRange.lower && upper == mRange.upper)
03752     return;
03753   
03754   if (!QCPRange::validRange(lower, upper)) return;
03755   mRange.lower = lower;
03756   mRange.upper = upper;
03757   if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
03758   {
03759     mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
03760   } else
03761   {
03762     mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
03763   }
03764   emit rangeChanged(mRange);
03765 }
03766 
03780 void QCPAxis::setRange(double position, double size, Qt::AlignmentFlag alignment)
03781 {
03782   if (alignment == Qt::AlignLeft)
03783     setRange(position, position+size);
03784   else if (alignment == Qt::AlignRight)
03785     setRange(position-size, position);
03786   else // alignment == Qt::AlignCenter
03787     setRange(position-size/2.0, position+size/2.0);
03788 }
03789 
03794 void QCPAxis::setRangeLower(double lower)
03795 {
03796   if (mRange.lower == lower)
03797     return;
03798   
03799   mRange.lower = lower;
03800   if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
03801   {
03802     mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
03803   } else
03804   {
03805     mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
03806   }
03807   emit rangeChanged(mRange);
03808 }
03809 
03814 void QCPAxis::setRangeUpper(double upper)
03815 {
03816   if (mRange.upper == upper)
03817     return;
03818   
03819   mRange.upper = upper;
03820   if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic)
03821   {
03822     mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
03823   } else
03824   {
03825     mRange = mRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
03826   }
03827   emit rangeChanged(mRange);
03828 }
03829 
03837 void QCPAxis::setRangeReversed(bool reversed)
03838 {
03839   mRangeReversed = reversed;
03840 }
03841

03849 {
03850   mGrid->setAntialiased(enabled);
03851 }

03861   mGrid->setAntialiasedSubGrid(enabled);
03862 }

03871 {
03872   mGrid->setAntialiasedZeroLine(enabled);
03873 }

03882 }

03889 {
03890   mGrid->setSubGridVisible(show);
03891 }

03948   mAutoTickStep = on;
03949 }

03960 }

03999 {
04000   mTickLabelType = type;
04001 }

04009 {
04010   mTickLabelFont = font;
04011 }

04019 {
04020   mTickLabelColor = color;
04021 }
04022 
04028 void QCPAxis::setTickLabelRotation(double degrees)
04029 {
04030   mTickLabelRotation = qBound(-90.0, degrees, 90.0);
04031 }
04032 
04038 void QCPAxis::setDateTimeFormat(const QString &format)
04039 {
04040   mDateTimeFormat = format;
04041 }
04042 
04079 void QCPAxis::setNumberFormat(const QString &formatCode)
04080 {
04081   if (formatCode.length() < 1) return;
04082   
04083   // interpret first char as number format char:
04084   QString allowedFormatChars = "eEfgG";
04085   if (allowedFormatChars.contains(formatCode.at(0)))
04086   {
04087     mNumberFormatChar = formatCode.at(0).toAscii();
04088   } else
04089   {
04090     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (first char not in 'eEfgG'):" << formatCode;
04091     return;
04092   }
04093   if (formatCode.length() < 2)
04094   {
04095     mNumberBeautifulPowers = false;
04096     mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
04097     return;
04098   }
04099   
04100   // interpret second char as indicator for beautiful decimal powers:
04101   if (formatCode.at(1) == 'b' && (mNumberFormatChar == 'e' || mNumberFormatChar == 'g'))
04102   {
04103     mNumberBeautifulPowers = true;
04104   } else
04105   {
04106     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (second char not 'b' or first char neither 'e' nor 'g'):" << formatCode;
04107     return;
04108   }
04109   if (formatCode.length() < 3)
04110   {
04111     mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
04112     return;
04113   }
04114   
04115   // interpret third char as indicator for dot or cross multiplication symbol:
04116   if (formatCode.at(2) == 'c')
04117   {
04118     mNumberMultiplyCross = true;
04119   } else if (formatCode.at(2) == 'd')
04120   {
04121     mNumberMultiplyCross = false;
04122   } else
04123   {
04124     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid number format code (third char neither 'c' nor 'd'):" << formatCode;
04125     return;
04126   }
04127 }
04128 
04140 void QCPAxis::setNumberPrecision(int precision)
04141 {
04142   mNumberPrecision = precision;
04143 }
04144 
04150 void QCPAxis::setTickStep(double step)
04151 {
04152   mTickStep = step;
04153 }
04154 
04167 void QCPAxis::setTickVector(const QVector<double> &vec)
04168 {
04169   mTickVector = vec;
04170 }

04183 {
04184   mTickVectorLabels = vec;
04185 }
04186

04195 {
04196   mTickLengthIn = inside;
04197   mTickLengthOut = outside;
04198 }

04209 void QCPAxis::setSubTickCount(int count)
04210 {
04211   mSubTickCount = count;
04212 }
04213

04222 {
04223   mSubTickLengthIn = inside;
04224   mSubTickLengthOut = outside;
04225 }

04348   mSelectedTickLabelFont = font;

04397 {

04407 {

04410 
04418 void QCPAxis::moveRange(double diff)
04419 {
04420   if (mScaleType == stLinear)
04421   {
04422     mRange.lower += diff;
04423     mRange.upper += diff;
04424   } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
04425   {
04426     mRange.lower *= diff;
04427     mRange.upper *= diff;
04428   }
04429   emit rangeChanged(mRange);
04430 }
04431 
04438 void QCPAxis::scaleRange(double factor, double center)
04439 {
04440   
04441   if (mScaleType == stLinear)
04442   {
04443     QCPRange newRange;
04444     newRange.lower = (mRange.lower-center)*factor + center;
04445     newRange.upper = (mRange.upper-center)*factor + center;
04446     if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
04447       mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
04448   } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
04449   {
04450     if ((mRange.upper < 0 && center < 0) || (mRange.upper > 0 && center > 0)) // make sure center has same sign as range
04451     {
04452       QCPRange newRange;
04453       newRange.lower = pow(mRange.lower/center, factor)*center;
04454       newRange.upper = pow(mRange.upper/center, factor)*center;
04455       if (QCPRange::validRange(newRange))
04456         mRange = newRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
04457     } else
04458       qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "center of scaling operation doesn't lie in same logarithmic sign domain as range:" << center;
04459   }
04460   emit rangeChanged(mRange);
04461 }
04462 
04471 void QCPAxis::setScaleRatio(const QCPAxis *otherAxis, double ratio)
04472 {
04473   int otherPixelSize, ownPixelSize;
04474   
04475   if (otherAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
04476     otherPixelSize = otherAxis->mAxisRect.width();
04477   else
04478     otherPixelSize = otherAxis->mAxisRect.height();
04479   
04480   if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
04481     ownPixelSize = mAxisRect.width();
04482   else
04483     ownPixelSize = mAxisRect.height();
04484   
04485   double newRangeSize = ratio*otherAxis->mRange.size()*ownPixelSize/(double)otherPixelSize;
04486   setRange(range().center(), newRangeSize, Qt::AlignCenter);
04487 }
04488 
04492 double QCPAxis::pixelToCoord(double value) const
04493 {
04494   if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
04495   {
04496     if (mScaleType == stLinear)
04497     {
04498       if (!mRangeReversed)
04499         return (value-mAxisRect.left())/(double)mAxisRect.width()*mRange.size()+mRange.lower;
04500       else
04501         return -(value-mAxisRect.left())/(double)mAxisRect.width()*mRange.size()+mRange.upper;
04502     } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
04503     {
04504       if (!mRangeReversed)
04505         return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (value-mAxisRect.left())/(double)mAxisRect.width())*mRange.lower;
04506       else
04507         return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (mAxisRect.left()-value)/(double)mAxisRect.width())*mRange.upper;
04508     }
04509   } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
04510   {
04511     if (mScaleType == stLinear)
04512     {
04513       if (!mRangeReversed)
04514         return (mAxisRect.bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect.height()*mRange.size()+mRange.lower;
04515       else
04516         return -(mAxisRect.bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect.height()*mRange.size()+mRange.upper;
04517     } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
04518     {
04519       if (!mRangeReversed)
04520         return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (mAxisRect.bottom()-value)/(double)mAxisRect.height())*mRange.lower;
04521       else
04522         return pow(mRange.upper/mRange.lower, (value-mAxisRect.bottom())/(double)mAxisRect.height())*mRange.upper;
04523     }
04524   }
04525 }
04526 
04530 double QCPAxis::coordToPixel(double value) const
04531 {
04532   if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
04533   {
04534     if (mScaleType == stLinear)
04535     {
04536       if (!mRangeReversed)
04537         return (value-mRange.lower)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect.width()+mAxisRect.left();
04538       else
04539         return (mRange.upper-value)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect.width()+mAxisRect.left();
04540     } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
04541     {
04542       if (value >= 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
04543         return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect.right()+200 : mAxisRect.left()-200;
04544       else if (value <= 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
04545         return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect.left()-200 : mAxisRect.right()+200;
04546       else
04547       {
04548         if (!mRangeReversed)
04549           return baseLog(value/mRange.lower)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect.width()+mAxisRect.left();
04550         else
04551           return baseLog(mRange.upper/value)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect.width()+mAxisRect.left();
04552       }
04553     }
04554   } else // orientation() == Qt::Vertical
04555   {
04556     if (mScaleType == stLinear)
04557     {
04558       if (!mRangeReversed)
04559         return mAxisRect.bottom()-(value-mRange.lower)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect.height();
04560       else
04561         return mAxisRect.bottom()-(mRange.upper-value)/mRange.size()*mAxisRect.height();
04562     } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
04563     {     
04564       if (value >= 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
04565         return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect.top()-200 : mAxisRect.bottom()+200;
04566       else if (value <= 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // invalid value for logarithmic scale, just draw it outside visible range
04567         return !mRangeReversed ? mAxisRect.bottom()+200 : mAxisRect.top()-200;
04568       else
04569       {
04570         if (!mRangeReversed)
04571           return mAxisRect.bottom()-baseLog(value/mRange.lower)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect.height();
04572         else
04573           return mAxisRect.bottom()-baseLog(mRange.upper/value)/baseLog(mRange.upper/mRange.lower)*mAxisRect.height();
04574       }
04575     }
04576   }
04577 }
04578 
04588 QCPAxis::SelectablePart QCPAxis::selectTest(const QPointF &pos) const
04589 {
04590   if (!mVisible)
04591     return spNone;
04592   
04593   if (mAxisSelectionBox.contains(pos.toPoint()))
04594     return spAxis;
04595   else if (mTickLabelsSelectionBox.contains(pos.toPoint()))
04596     return spTickLabels;
04597   else if (mLabelSelectionBox.contains(pos.toPoint()))
04598     return spAxisLabel;
04599   else
04600     return spNone;
04601 }
04602 
04611 void QCPAxis::setupTickVectors()
04612 {
04613   if ((!mTicks && !mTickLabels && !mGrid->visible()) || mRange.size() <= 0) return;
04614   
04615   // fill tick vectors, either by auto generating or by notifying user to fill the vectors himself
04616   if (mAutoTicks)
04617   {
04618     generateAutoTicks();
04619   } else
04620   {
04621     emit ticksRequest();
04622   }
04623   
04624   visibleTickBounds(mLowestVisibleTick, mHighestVisibleTick);
04625   if (mTickVector.isEmpty())
04626   {
04627     mSubTickVector.clear();
04628     return;
04629   }
04630   
04631   // generate subticks between ticks:
04632   mSubTickVector.resize((mTickVector.size()-1)*mSubTickCount);
04633   if (mSubTickCount > 0)
04634   {
04635     double subTickStep = 0;
04636     double subTickPosition = 0;
04637     int subTickIndex = 0;
04638     bool done = false;
04639     for (int i=1; i<mTickVector.size(); ++i)
04640     {
04641       subTickStep = (mTickVector.at(i)-mTickVector.at(i-1))/(double)(mSubTickCount+1);
04642       for (int k=1; k<=mSubTickCount; ++k)
04643       {
04644         subTickPosition = mTickVector.at(i-1) + k*subTickStep;
04645         if (subTickPosition < mRange.lower)
04646           continue;
04647         if (subTickPosition > mRange.upper)
04648         {
04649           done = true;
04650           break;
04651         }
04652         mSubTickVector[subTickIndex] = subTickPosition;
04653         subTickIndex++;
04654       }
04655       if (done) break;
04656     }
04657     mSubTickVector.resize(subTickIndex);
04658   }
04659 
04660   // generate tick labels according to tick positions:
04661   mExponentialChar = mParentPlot->locale().exponential();   // will be needed when drawing the numbers generated here, in drawTickLabel()
04662   mPositiveSignChar = mParentPlot->locale().positiveSign(); // will be needed when drawing the numbers generated here, in drawTickLabel()
04663   if (mAutoTickLabels)
04664   {
04665     int vecsize = mTickVector.size();
04666     mTickVectorLabels.resize(vecsize);
04667     if (mTickLabelType == ltNumber)
04668     {
04669       for (int i=0; i<vecsize; ++i)
04670         mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(mTickVector.at(i), mNumberFormatChar, mNumberPrecision);
04671     } else if (mTickLabelType == ltDateTime)
04672     {
04673       for (int i=0; i<vecsize; ++i)
04674       {
04675 #if QT_VERSION < QT_VERSION_CHECK(4, 7, 0) // use fromMSecsSinceEpoch function if available, to gain sub-second accuracy on tick labels (e.g. for format "hh:mm:ss:zzz")
04676         mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(QDateTime::fromTime_t(mTickVector.at(i)), mDateTimeFormat);
04677 #else
04678         mTickVectorLabels[i] = mParentPlot->locale().toString(QDateTime::fromMSecsSinceEpoch(mTickVector.at(i)*1000), mDateTimeFormat);
04679 #endif
04680       }
04681     }
04682   } else // mAutoTickLabels == false
04683   {
04684     if (mAutoTicks) // ticks generated automatically, but not ticklabels, so emit ticksRequest here for labels
04685     {
04686       emit ticksRequest();
04687     }
04688     // make sure provided tick label vector has correct (minimal) length:
04689     if (mTickVectorLabels.size() < mTickVector.size())
04690       mTickVectorLabels.resize(mTickVector.size());
04691   }
04692 }
04693 
04703 void QCPAxis::generateAutoTicks()
04704 {
04705   if (mScaleType == stLinear)
04706   {
04707     if (mAutoTickStep)
04708     {
04709       // Generate tick positions according to linear scaling:
04710       mTickStep = mRange.size()/(double)(mAutoTickCount+1e-10); // mAutoTickCount ticks on average, the small addition is to prevent jitter on exact integers
04711       double magnitudeFactor = qPow(10.0, qFloor(qLn(mTickStep)/qLn(10.0))); // get magnitude factor e.g. 0.01, 1, 10, 1000 etc.
04712       double tickStepMantissa = mTickStep/magnitudeFactor;
04713       if (tickStepMantissa < 5)
04714       {
04715         // round digit after decimal point to 0.5
04716         mTickStep = (int)(tickStepMantissa*2)/2.0*magnitudeFactor;
04717       } else
04718       {
04719         // round to first digit in multiples of 2
04720         mTickStep = (int)((tickStepMantissa/10.0)*5)/5.0*10*magnitudeFactor;
04721       }
04722     }
04723     if (mAutoSubTicks)
04724       mSubTickCount = calculateAutoSubTickCount(mTickStep);
04725     // Generate tick positions according to mTickStep:
04726     int firstStep = floor(mRange.lower/mTickStep);
04727     int lastStep = ceil(mRange.upper/mTickStep);
04728     int tickcount = lastStep-firstStep+1;
04729     if (tickcount < 0) tickcount = 0;
04730     mTickVector.resize(tickcount);
04731     for (int i=0; i<tickcount; ++i)
04732     {
04733       mTickVector[i] = (firstStep+i)*mTickStep;
04734     }
04735   } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
04736   {
04737     // Generate tick positions according to logbase scaling:
04738     if (mRange.lower > 0 && mRange.upper > 0) // positive range
04739     {
04740       double lowerMag = basePow((int)floor(baseLog(mRange.lower)));
04741       double currentMag = lowerMag;
04742       mTickVector.clear();
04743       mTickVector.append(currentMag);
04744       while (currentMag < mRange.upper && currentMag > 0) // currentMag might be zero for ranges ~1e-300, just cancel in that case
04745       {
04746         currentMag *= mScaleLogBase;
04747         mTickVector.append(currentMag);
04748       }
04749     } else if (mRange.lower < 0 && mRange.upper < 0) // negative range
04750     {
04751       double lowerMag = -basePow((int)ceil(baseLog(-mRange.lower)));
04752       double currentMag = lowerMag;
04753       mTickVector.clear();
04754       mTickVector.append(currentMag);
04755       while (currentMag < mRange.upper && currentMag < 0) // currentMag might be zero for ranges ~1e-300, just cancel in that case
04756       {
04757         currentMag /= mScaleLogBase;
04758         mTickVector.append(currentMag);
04759       }
04760     } else // invalid range for logarithmic scale, because lower and upper have different sign
04761     {
04762       mTickVector.clear();
04763       qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Invalid range for logarithmic plot: " << mRange.lower << "-" << mRange.upper;
04764     }
04765   }
04766 }
04767 
04781 int QCPAxis::calculateAutoSubTickCount(double tickStep) const
04782 {
04783   int result = mSubTickCount; // default to current setting, if no proper value can be found
04784   
04785   // get mantissa of tickstep:
04786   double magnitudeFactor = qPow(10.0, qFloor(qLn(tickStep)/qLn(10.0))); // get magnitude factor e.g. 0.01, 1, 10, 1000 etc.
04787   double tickStepMantissa = tickStep/magnitudeFactor;
04788   
04789   // separate integer and fractional part of mantissa:
04790   double epsilon = 0.01;
04791   double intPartf;
04792   int intPart;
04793   double fracPart = modf(tickStepMantissa, &intPartf);
04794   intPart = intPartf;
04795   
04796   // handle cases with (almost) integer mantissa:
04797   if (fracPart < epsilon || 1.0-fracPart < epsilon)
04798   {
04799     if (1.0-fracPart < epsilon)
04800       intPart++;
04801     switch (intPart)
04802     {
04803       case 1: result = 4; break; // 1.0 -> 0.2 substep
04804       case 2: result = 3; break; // 2.0 -> 0.5 substep
04805       case 3: result = 2; break; // 3.0 -> 1.0 substep
04806       case 4: result = 3; break; // 4.0 -> 1.0 substep
04807       case 5: result = 4; break; // 5.0 -> 1.0 substep
04808       case 6: result = 2; break; // 6.0 -> 2.0 substep
04809       case 7: result = 6; break; // 7.0 -> 1.0 substep
04810       case 8: result = 3; break; // 8.0 -> 2.0 substep
04811       case 9: result = 2; break; // 9.0 -> 3.0 substep
04812     }
04813   } else
04814   {
04815     // handle cases with significantly fractional mantissa:
04816     if (qAbs(fracPart-0.5) < epsilon) // *.5 mantissa
04817     {
04818       switch (intPart)
04819       {
04820         case 1: result = 2; break; // 1.5 -> 0.5 substep
04821         case 2: result = 4; break; // 2.5 -> 0.5 substep
04822         case 3: result = 4; break; // 3.5 -> 0.7 substep
04823         case 4: result = 2; break; // 4.5 -> 1.5 substep
04824         case 5: result = 4; break; // 5.5 -> 1.1 substep (won't occur with autoTickStep from here on)
04825         case 6: result = 4; break; // 6.5 -> 1.3 substep
04826         case 7: result = 2; break; // 7.5 -> 2.5 substep
04827         case 8: result = 4; break; // 8.5 -> 1.7 substep
04828         case 9: result = 4; break; // 9.5 -> 1.9 substep
04829       }
04830     }
04831     // if mantissa fraction isnt 0.0 or 0.5, don't bother finding good sub tick marks, leave default
04832   }
04833   
04834   return result;
04835 }
04836 
04845 void QCPAxis::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
04846 {
04847   QPoint origin;
04848   if (mAxisType == atLeft)
04849     origin = mAxisRect.bottomLeft();
04850   else if (mAxisType == atRight)
04851     origin = mAxisRect.bottomRight();
04852   else if (mAxisType == atTop)
04853     origin = mAxisRect.topLeft();
04854   else if (mAxisType == atBottom)
04855     origin = mAxisRect.bottomLeft();
04856   
04857   double xCor = 0, yCor = 0; // paint system correction, for pixel exact matches (affects baselines and ticks of top/right axes)
04858   switch (mAxisType)
04859   {
04860     case atTop: yCor = -1; break;
04861     case atRight: xCor = 1; break;
04862     default: break;
04863   }
04864   
04865   int margin = 0;
04866   int lowTick = mLowestVisibleTick;
04867   int highTick = mHighestVisibleTick;
04868   double t; // helper variable, result of coordinate-to-pixel transforms
04869 
04870   // draw baseline:
04871   painter->setPen(getBasePen());
04872   if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
04873     painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin+QPointF(xCor, yCor), origin+QPointF(mAxisRect.width()+xCor, yCor)));
04874   else
04875     painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin+QPointF(xCor, yCor), origin+QPointF(xCor, -mAxisRect.height()+yCor)));
04876   
04877   // draw ticks:
04878   if (mTicks)
04879   {
04880     painter->setPen(getTickPen());
04881     // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left axis and left for right axis)
04882     int tickDir = (mAxisType == atBottom || mAxisType == atRight) ? -1 : 1;
04883     if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
04884     {
04885       for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
04886       {
04887         t = coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)); // x
04888         painter->drawLine(QLineF(t+xCor, origin.y()-mTickLengthOut*tickDir+yCor, t+xCor, origin.y()+mTickLengthIn*tickDir+yCor));
04889       }
04890     } else
04891     {
04892       for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
04893       {
04894         t = coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i)); // y
04895         painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x()-mTickLengthOut*tickDir+xCor, t+yCor, origin.x()+mTickLengthIn*tickDir+xCor, t+yCor));
04896       }
04897     }
04898   }
04899   
04900   // draw subticks:
04901   if (mTicks && mSubTickCount > 0)
04902   {
04903     painter->setPen(getSubTickPen());
04904     // direction of ticks ("inward" is right for left axis and left for right axis)
04905     int tickDir = (mAxisType == atBottom || mAxisType == atRight) ? -1 : 1;
04906     if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
04907     {
04908       for (int i=0; i<mSubTickVector.size(); ++i) // no need to check bounds because subticks are always only created inside current mRange
04909       {
04910         t = coordToPixel(mSubTickVector.at(i));
04911         painter->drawLine(QLineF(t+xCor, origin.y()-mSubTickLengthOut*tickDir+yCor, t+xCor, origin.y()+mSubTickLengthIn*tickDir+yCor));
04912       }
04913     } else
04914     {
04915       for (int i=0; i<mSubTickVector.size(); ++i)
04916       {
04917         t = coordToPixel(mSubTickVector.at(i));
04918         painter->drawLine(QLineF(origin.x()-mSubTickLengthOut*tickDir+xCor, t+yCor, origin.x()+mSubTickLengthIn*tickDir+xCor, t+yCor));
04919       }
04920     }
04921   }
04922   margin += qMax(0, qMax(mTickLengthOut, mSubTickLengthOut));
04923   
04924   // tick labels:
04925   QSize tickLabelsSize(0, 0); // size of largest tick label, for offset calculation of axis label
04926   if (mTickLabels)
04927   {
04928     margin += mTickLabelPadding;
04929     painter->setFont(getTickLabelFont());
04930     painter->setPen(QPen(getTickLabelColor()));
04931     for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
04932     {
04933       t = coordToPixel(mTickVector.at(i));
04934       drawTickLabel(painter, t, margin, mTickVectorLabels.at(i), &tickLabelsSize);
04935     }
04936   }
04937   if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
04938     margin += tickLabelsSize.height();
04939   else
04940     margin += tickLabelsSize.width();
04941 
04942   // axis label:
04943   QRect labelBounds;
04944   if (!mLabel.isEmpty())
04945   {
04946     margin += mLabelPadding;
04947     painter->setFont(getLabelFont());
04948     painter->setPen(QPen(getLabelColor()));
04949     labelBounds = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, mLabel);
04950     if (mAxisType == atLeft)
04951     {
04952       QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
04953       painter->translate((origin.x()-margin-labelBounds.height()), origin.y());
04954       painter->rotate(-90);
04955       painter->drawText(0, 0, mAxisRect.height(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, mLabel);
04956       painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
04957     }
04958     else if (mAxisType == atRight)
04959     {
04960       QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
04961       painter->translate((origin.x()+margin+labelBounds.height()), origin.y()-mAxisRect.height());
04962       painter->rotate(90);
04963       painter->drawText(0, 0, mAxisRect.height(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, mLabel);
04964       painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
04965     }
04966     else if (mAxisType == atTop)
04967       painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y()-margin-labelBounds.height(), mAxisRect.width(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, mLabel);
04968     else if (mAxisType == atBottom)
04969       painter->drawText(origin.x(), origin.y()+margin, mAxisRect.width(), labelBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignCenter, mLabel);
04970   }
04971   
04972   // set selection boxes:
04973   int selAxisOutSize = qMax(qMax(mTickLengthOut, mSubTickLengthOut), mParentPlot->selectionTolerance());
04974   int selAxisInSize = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance();
04975   int selTickLabelSize = (orientation()==Qt::Horizontal ? tickLabelsSize.height() : tickLabelsSize.width());
04976   int selTickLabelOffset = qMax(mTickLengthOut, mSubTickLengthOut)+mTickLabelPadding;
04977   int selLabelSize = labelBounds.height();
04978   int selLabelOffset = selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize+mLabelPadding;
04979   if (mAxisType == atLeft)
04980   {
04981     mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect.left()-selAxisOutSize, mAxisRect.top(), mAxisRect.left()+selAxisInSize, mAxisRect.bottom());
04982     mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect.left()-selTickLabelOffset-selTickLabelSize, mAxisRect.top(), mAxisRect.left()-selTickLabelOffset, mAxisRect.bottom());
04983     mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect.left()-selLabelOffset-selLabelSize, mAxisRect.top(), mAxisRect.left()-selLabelOffset, mAxisRect.bottom());
04984   } else if (mAxisType == atRight)
04985   {
04986     mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect.right()-selAxisInSize, mAxisRect.top(), mAxisRect.right()+selAxisOutSize, mAxisRect.bottom());
04987     mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect.right()+selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize, mAxisRect.top(), mAxisRect.right()+selTickLabelOffset, mAxisRect.bottom());
04988     mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect.right()+selLabelOffset+selLabelSize, mAxisRect.top(), mAxisRect.right()+selLabelOffset, mAxisRect.bottom());
04989   } else if (mAxisType == atTop)
04990   {
04991     mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect.left(), mAxisRect.top()-selAxisOutSize, mAxisRect.right(), mAxisRect.top()+selAxisInSize);
04992     mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect.left(), mAxisRect.top()-selTickLabelOffset-selTickLabelSize, mAxisRect.right(), mAxisRect.top()-selTickLabelOffset);
04993     mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect.left(), mAxisRect.top()-selLabelOffset-selLabelSize, mAxisRect.right(), mAxisRect.top()-selLabelOffset);
04994   } else if (mAxisType == atBottom)
04995   {
04996     mAxisSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect.left(), mAxisRect.bottom()-selAxisInSize, mAxisRect.right(), mAxisRect.bottom()+selAxisOutSize);
04997     mTickLabelsSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect.left(), mAxisRect.bottom()+selTickLabelOffset+selTickLabelSize, mAxisRect.right(), mAxisRect.bottom()+selTickLabelOffset);
04998     mLabelSelectionBox.setCoords(mAxisRect.left(), mAxisRect.bottom()+selLabelOffset+selLabelSize, mAxisRect.right(), mAxisRect.bottom()+selLabelOffset);
04999   }
05000   // draw hitboxes for debug purposes:
05001   //painter->drawRects(QVector<QRect>() << mAxisSelectionBox << mTickLabelsSelectionBox << mLabelSelectionBox);
05002 }
05003 
05025 void QCPAxis::drawTickLabel(QCPPainter *painter, double position, int distanceToAxis, const QString &text, QSize *tickLabelsSize)
05026 {
05027   // warning: if you change anything here, also adapt getMaxTickLabelSize() accordingly!
05028   
05029   // determine whether beautiful decimal powers should be used
05030   bool useBeautifulPowers = false;
05031   int ePos = -1;
05032   if (mAutoTickLabels && mNumberBeautifulPowers && mTickLabelType == ltNumber)
05033   {
05034     ePos = text.indexOf('e');
05035     if (ePos > -1)
05036       useBeautifulPowers = true;
05037   }
05038   
05039   // calculate text bounding rects and do string preparation for beautiful decimal powers:
05040   QRect bounds, baseBounds, expBounds;
05041   QString basePart, expPart;
05042   QFont bugFixFont(painter->font());
05043   bugFixFont.setPointSizeF(bugFixFont.pointSizeF()+0.05); // QFontMetrics.boundingRect has a bug for exact point sizes that make the results oscillate due to internal rounding 
05044   QFont expFont;
05045   if (useBeautifulPowers)
05046   {
05047     // split string parts for part of number/symbol that will be drawn normally and part that will be drawn as exponent:
05048     basePart = text.left(ePos);
05049     // in log scaling, we want to turn "1*10^n" into "10^n", else add multiplication sign and decimal base:
05050     if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic && basePart == "1")
05051       basePart = "10";
05052     else
05053       basePart += (mNumberMultiplyCross ? QString(QChar(215)) : QString(QChar(183))) + "10";
05054     expPart = text.mid(ePos+1);
05055     // clip "+" and leading zeros off expPart:
05056     while (expPart.at(1) == '0' && expPart.length() > 2) // length > 2 so we leave one zero when numberFormatChar is 'e'
05057       expPart.remove(1, 1);
05058     if (expPart.at(0) == mPositiveSignChar)
05059       expPart.remove(0, 1);
05060     // prepare smaller font for exponent:
05061     expFont = painter->font();
05062     expFont.setPointSize(expFont.pointSize()*0.75);
05063     // calculate bounding rects of base part, exponent part and total one:
05064     QFontMetrics fontMetrics(bugFixFont);
05065     baseBounds = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, basePart);
05066     QFontMetrics expFontMetrics(expFont);
05067     expBounds = expFontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, expPart);
05068     bounds = baseBounds.adjusted(0, 0, expBounds.width(), 0);
05069   } else // useBeautifulPowers == false
05070   {
05071     QFontMetrics fontMetrics(bugFixFont);
05072     bounds = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, text);
05073   }
05074   
05075   // if using rotated tick labels, transform bounding rect, too:
05076   QRect rotatedBounds = bounds;
05077   if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mTickLabelRotation))
05078   {
05079     QTransform transform;
05080     transform.rotate(mTickLabelRotation);
05081     rotatedBounds = transform.mapRect(bounds);
05082   }
05083   // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
05084   if (rotatedBounds.width() > tickLabelsSize->width()) 
05085     tickLabelsSize->setWidth(rotatedBounds.width());
05086   if (rotatedBounds.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
05087     tickLabelsSize->setHeight(rotatedBounds.height());
05088   
05089   /*
05090     calculate coordinates (non-trivial, for best visual appearance): short explanation for bottom
05091     axis: The anchor, i.e. the point in the label that is placed horizontally under the
05092     corresponding tick is always on the label side that is closer to the axis (e.g. the left side
05093     of the text when we're rotating clockwise). On that side, the height is halved and the
05094     resulting point is defined the anchor. This way, a 90 degree rotated text will be centered
05095     under the tick (i.e. displaced horizontally by half its height). At the same time, a 45 degree
05096     rotated text will "point toward" its tick, as is typical for rotated tick labels.
05097   */
05098   bool doRotation = !qFuzzyIsNull(mTickLabelRotation);
05099   double radians = mTickLabelRotation/180.0*M_PI;
05100   int x=0,y=0;
05101   if (mAxisType == atLeft)
05102   {
05103     if (doRotation)
05104     {
05105       if (mTickLabelRotation > 0)
05106       {
05107         x = mAxisRect.left()-qCos(radians)*bounds.width()-distanceToAxis;
05108         y = position-qSin(radians)*bounds.width()-qCos(radians)*bounds.height()/2.0;
05109       } else
05110       {
05111         x = mAxisRect.left()-qCos(-radians)*bounds.width()-qSin(-radians)*bounds.height()-distanceToAxis;
05112         y = position+qSin(-radians)*bounds.width()-qCos(-radians)*bounds.height()/2.0;
05113       }
05114     } else
05115     {
05116       x = mAxisRect.left()-bounds.width()-distanceToAxis;
05117       y = position-bounds.height()/2.0;
05118     }
05119   } else if (mAxisType == atRight)
05120   {
05121     if (doRotation)
05122     {
05123       if (mTickLabelRotation > 0)
05124       {
05125         x = mAxisRect.right()+qSin(radians)*bounds.height()+distanceToAxis;
05126         y = position-qCos(radians)*bounds.height()/2.0;
05127       } else
05128       {
05129         x = mAxisRect.right()+distanceToAxis;
05130         y = position-qCos(-radians)*bounds.height()/2.0;
05131       }
05132     } else
05133     {
05134       x = mAxisRect.right()+distanceToAxis;
05135       y = position-bounds.height()/2.0;
05136     }
05137   } else if (mAxisType == atTop)
05138   {
05139     if (doRotation)
05140     {
05141       if (mTickLabelRotation > 0)
05142       {
05143         x = position-qCos(radians)*bounds.width()+qSin(radians)*bounds.height()/2.0;
05144         y = mAxisRect.top()-qSin(radians)*bounds.width()-qCos(radians)*bounds.height()-distanceToAxis;
05145       } else
05146       {
05147         x = position-qSin(-radians)*bounds.height()/2.0;
05148         y = mAxisRect.top()-qCos(-radians)*bounds.height()-distanceToAxis;
05149       }
05150     } else
05151     {
05152       x = position-bounds.width()/2.0;
05153       y = mAxisRect.top()-bounds.height()-distanceToAxis;
05154     }
05155   } else if (mAxisType == atBottom)
05156   {
05157     if (doRotation)
05158     {
05159       if (mTickLabelRotation > 0)
05160       {
05161         x = position+qSin(radians)*bounds.height()/2.0;
05162         y = mAxisRect.bottom()+distanceToAxis;
05163       } else
05164       {
05165         x = position-qCos(-radians)*bounds.width()-qSin(-radians)*bounds.height()/2.0;
05166         y = mAxisRect.bottom()+qSin(-radians)*bounds.width()+distanceToAxis;
05167       }
05168     } else
05169     {
05170       x = position-bounds.width()/2.0;
05171       y = mAxisRect.bottom()+distanceToAxis;
05172     }
05173   }
05174   
05175   // if label would be partly clipped by widget border on sides, don't draw it:
05176   if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
05177   {
05178     if (x+bounds.width() > mParentPlot->mViewport.right() ||
05179         x < mParentPlot->mViewport.left())
05180       return;
05181   } else
05182   {
05183     if (y+bounds.height() > mParentPlot->mViewport.bottom() ||
05184         y < mParentPlot->mViewport.top())
05185       return;
05186   }
05187   
05188   // transform painter to position/rotation:
05189   QTransform oldTransform = painter->transform();
05190   painter->translate(x, y);
05191   if (doRotation)
05192     painter->rotate(mTickLabelRotation);
05193   // draw text:
05194   if (useBeautifulPowers)
05195   {
05196     // draw base:
05197     painter->drawText(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, basePart);
05198     // draw exponent:
05199     QFont normalFont = painter->font();
05200     painter->setFont(expFont);
05201     painter->drawText(baseBounds.width()+1, 0, expBounds.width(), expBounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip,  expPart);
05202     painter->setFont(normalFont);
05203   } else // useBeautifulPowers == false
05204   {
05205     painter->drawText(0, 0, bounds.width(), bounds.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, text);
05206   }
05207   
05208   // reset rotation/translation transform to what it was before:
05209   painter->setTransform(oldTransform);
05210 }
05211 
05219 void QCPAxis::getMaxTickLabelSize(const QFont &font, const QString &text,  QSize *tickLabelsSize) const
05220 {
05221   // This function does the same as drawTickLabel but omits the actual drawing
05222   // changes involve creating extra QFontMetrics instances for font, since painter->fontMetrics() isn't available
05223   
05224   // determine whether beautiful powers should be used
05225   bool useBeautifulPowers = false;
05226   int ePos=-1;
05227   if (mAutoTickLabels && mNumberBeautifulPowers && mTickLabelType == ltNumber)
05228   {
05229     ePos = text.indexOf(mExponentialChar);
05230     if (ePos > -1)
05231       useBeautifulPowers = true;
05232   }
05233   
05234   // calculate and draw text, depending on whether beautiful powers are applicable or not:
05235   QRect bounds, baseBounds, expBounds;
05236   QString basePart, expPart;
05237   QFont bugFixFont(font);
05238   bugFixFont.setPointSizeF(bugFixFont.pointSizeF()+0.05); // QFontMetrics.boundingRect has a bug for exact point sizes that make the results oscillate due to internal rounding 
05239   QFont expFont;
05240   if (useBeautifulPowers)
05241   {
05242     // split string parts for part of number/symbol that will be drawn normally and part that will be drawn as exponent:
05243     basePart = text.left(ePos);
05244     // in log scaling, we want to turn "1*10^n" into "10^n", else add multiplication sign and decimal base:
05245     if (mScaleType == stLogarithmic && basePart == "1")
05246       basePart = "10";
05247     else
05248       basePart += (mNumberMultiplyCross ? QString(QChar(215)) : QString(QChar(183))) + "10";
05249     expPart = text.mid(ePos+1);
05250     // clip "+" and leading zeros off expPart:
05251     while (expPart.at(1) == '0' && expPart.length() > 2) // length > 2 so we leave one zero when numberFormatChar is 'e'
05252       expPart.remove(1, 1);
05253     if (expPart.at(0) == mPositiveSignChar)
05254       expPart.remove(0, 1);
05255     // prepare smaller font for exponent:
05256     expFont = font;
05257     expFont.setPointSize(expFont.pointSize()*0.75);
05258     // calculate bounding rects of base part, exponent part and total one:
05259     QFontMetrics baseFontMetrics(bugFixFont);
05260     baseBounds = baseFontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, basePart);
05261     QFontMetrics expFontMetrics(expFont);
05262     expBounds = expFontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip, expPart);
05263     bounds = baseBounds.adjusted(0, 0, expBounds.width(), 0); 
05264   } else // useBeautifulPowers == false
05265   {
05266     QFontMetrics fontMetrics(bugFixFont);
05267     bounds = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, text);
05268   }
05269   
05270   // if rotated tick labels, transform bounding rect, too:
05271   QRect rotatedBounds = bounds;
05272   if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mTickLabelRotation))
05273   {
05274     QTransform transform;
05275     transform.rotate(mTickLabelRotation);
05276     rotatedBounds = transform.mapRect(bounds);
05277   }
05278   
05279   // expand passed tickLabelsSize if current tick label is larger:
05280   if (rotatedBounds.width() > tickLabelsSize->width()) 
05281     tickLabelsSize->setWidth(rotatedBounds.width());
05282   if (rotatedBounds.height() > tickLabelsSize->height())
05283     tickLabelsSize->setHeight(rotatedBounds.height());
05284 }
05285 
05299 bool QCPAxis::handleAxisSelection(QMouseEvent *event, bool additiveSelection, bool &modified)
05300 {
05301   bool selectionFound = false;
05302   if (event)
05303   {
05304     SelectablePart selectedAxisPart = selectTest(event->pos());
05305     if (selectedAxisPart == spNone || !selectable().testFlag(selectedAxisPart))
05306     {
05307       // deselect parts that are changeable (selectable):
05308       SelectableParts newState = selected() & ~selectable();
05309       if (newState != selected() && !additiveSelection)
05310       {
05311         modified = true;
05312         setSelected(newState);
05313       }
05314     } else
05315     {
05316       selectionFound = true;
05317       if (additiveSelection)
05318       {
05319         // additive selection, so toggle selected part:
05320         setSelected(selected() ^ selectedAxisPart);
05321         modified = true;
05322       } else
05323       {
05324         // not additive selection, so select part and deselect all others that are changeable (selectable):
05325         SelectableParts newState = (selected() & ~selectable()) | selectedAxisPart;
05326         if (newState != selected())
05327         {
05328           modified = true;
05329           setSelected(newState);
05330         }
05331       }
05332     }
05333   } else // event == 0, so deselect all changeable parts
05334   {
05335     SelectableParts newState = selected() & ~selectable();
05336     if (newState != selected())
05337     {
05338       modified = true;
05339       setSelected(newState);
05340     }
05341   }
05342   return selectionFound;
05343 }
05344 
05357 void QCPAxis::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
05358 {
05359   applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeAxes);
05360 }
05361 
05372 void QCPAxis::visibleTickBounds(int &lowIndex, int &highIndex) const
05373 {
05374   lowIndex = 0;
05375   highIndex = -1;
05376   // make sure only ticks that are in visible range are returned
05377   for (int i=0; i < mTickVector.size(); ++i)
05378   {
05379     lowIndex = i;
05380     if (mTickVector.at(i) >= mRange.lower) break;
05381   }
05382   for (int i=mTickVector.size()-1; i >= 0; --i)
05383   {
05384     highIndex = i;
05385     if (mTickVector.at(i) <= mRange.upper) break;
05386   }
05387 }
05388 
05397 double QCPAxis::baseLog(double value) const
05398 {
05399   return qLn(value)*mScaleLogBaseLogInv;
05400 }
05401 
05409 double QCPAxis::basePow(double value) const
05410 {
05411   return qPow(mScaleLogBase, value);
05412 }
05413 
05419 QPen QCPAxis::getBasePen() const
05420 {
05421   return mSelected.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedBasePen : mBasePen;
05422 }
05423 
05429 QPen QCPAxis::getTickPen() const
05430 {
05431   return mSelected.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedTickPen : mTickPen;
05432 }
05433 
05439 QPen QCPAxis::getSubTickPen() const
05440 {
05441   return mSelected.testFlag(spAxis) ? mSelectedSubTickPen : mSubTickPen;
05442 }
05443 
05449 QFont QCPAxis::getTickLabelFont() const
05450 {
05451   return mSelected.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelFont : mTickLabelFont;
05452 }
05453 
05459 QFont QCPAxis::getLabelFont() const
05460 {
05461   return mSelected.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelFont : mLabelFont;
05462 }
05463 
05469 QColor QCPAxis::getTickLabelColor() const
05470 {
05471   return mSelected.testFlag(spTickLabels) ? mSelectedTickLabelColor : mTickLabelColor;
05472 }
05473 
05479 QColor QCPAxis::getLabelColor() const
05480 {
05481   return mSelected.testFlag(spAxisLabel) ? mSelectedLabelColor : mLabelColor;
05482 }
05483 
05499 int QCPAxis::calculateMargin() const
05500 {
05501   // run through similar steps as QCPAxis::draw, and caluclate margin needed to fit axis and its labels
05502   int margin = 0;
05503   
05504   if (mVisible)
05505   {
05506     int lowTick, highTick;
05507     visibleTickBounds(lowTick, highTick);
05508     // get length of tick marks reaching outside axis rect:
05509     margin += qMax(0, qMax(mTickLengthOut, mSubTickLengthOut));
05510     // calculate size of tick labels:
05511     QSize tickLabelsSize(0, 0);
05512     if (mTickLabels)
05513     {
05514       for (int i=lowTick; i <= highTick; ++i)
05515       {
05516         getMaxTickLabelSize(mTickLabelFont, mTickVectorLabels.at(i), &tickLabelsSize); // don't use getTickLabelFont() because we don't want margin to possibly change on selection
05517       }
05518       if (orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
05519         margin += tickLabelsSize.height() + mTickLabelPadding;
05520       else
05521         margin += tickLabelsSize.width() + mTickLabelPadding;
05522     }
05523     // calculate size of axis label (only height needed, because left/right labels are rotated by 90 degrees):
05524     if (!mLabel.isEmpty())
05525     {
05526       QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mLabelFont); // don't use getLabelFont() because we don't want margin to possibly change on selection
05527       QRect bounds;
05528       bounds = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter | Qt::AlignVCenter, mLabel);
05529       margin += bounds.height() + mLabelPadding;
05530     }
05531   }
05532   margin += mPadding;
05533   
05534   if (margin < 15) // need a bit of margin if no axis text is shown at all (i.e. only baseline and tick lines, or no axis at all)
05535     margin = 15;
05536   return margin;
05537 }
05538 
05539 
05540 // ================================================================================
05541 // =================== QCustomPlot
05542 // ================================================================================
05543 
05551 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
05552 
05568 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
05569 /* start of documentation of signals */
05570 
05750 /* end of documentation of signals */
05751 
05758 QCustomPlot::QCustomPlot(QWidget *parent) :
05759   QWidget(parent),
05760   mDragging(false),
05761   mReplotting(false),
05762   mPlottingHints(QCP::phNone)
05763 {
05764   setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoMousePropagation);
05765   setAttribute(Qt::WA_OpaquePaintEvent);
05766   setMouseTracking(true);
05767   QLocale currentLocale = locale();
05768   currentLocale.setNumberOptions(QLocale::OmitGroupSeparator);
05769   setLocale(currentLocale);
05770   
05771   // create very first layers:
05772   QCPLayer *gridLayer = new QCPLayer(this, "grid");
05773   QCPLayer *mainLayer = new QCPLayer(this, "main");
05774   QCPLayer *axesLayer = new QCPLayer(this, "axes");
05775   mLayers.append(gridLayer);
05776   mLayers.append(mainLayer);
05777   mLayers.append(axesLayer);
05778   setCurrentLayer(mainLayer);
05779 
05780   mPaintBuffer = QPixmap(size());
05781   legend = new QCPLegend(this);
05782   legend->setVisible(false);
05783   legend->setLayer(axesLayer);
05784   xAxis = new QCPAxis(this, QCPAxis::atBottom);
05785   yAxis = new QCPAxis(this, QCPAxis::atLeft);
05786   xAxis2 = new QCPAxis(this, QCPAxis::atTop);
05787   yAxis2 = new QCPAxis(this, QCPAxis::atRight);
05788   xAxis2->setGrid(false);
05789   yAxis2->setGrid(false);
05790   xAxis2->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
05791   yAxis2->setZeroLinePen(Qt::NoPen);
05792   xAxis2->setVisible(false);
05793   yAxis2->setVisible(false);
05794   xAxis->setLayer(axesLayer);
05795   yAxis->setLayer(axesLayer);
05796   xAxis2->setLayer(axesLayer);
05797   yAxis2->setLayer(axesLayer);
05798   xAxis->mGrid->setLayer(gridLayer);
05799   yAxis->mGrid->setLayer(gridLayer);
05800   xAxis2->mGrid->setLayer(gridLayer);
05801   yAxis2->mGrid->setLayer(gridLayer);
05802   mViewport = rect();
05803   
05804   setNoAntialiasingOnDrag(false);
05805   setAutoAddPlottableToLegend(true);
05806   setAxisBackgroundScaled(true);
05807   setAxisBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::KeepAspectRatioByExpanding);
05808   setTitleFont(QFont(font().family(), 14, QFont::Bold));
05809   setTitleColor(Qt::black);
05810   setSelectedTitleFont(QFont(font().family(), 14, QFont::Bold));
05811   setSelectedTitleColor(Qt::blue);
05812   setTitleSelected(false);
05813   setTitle("");
05814   setColor(Qt::white);
05815   
05816 #ifdef Q_WS_WIN
05817   setPlottingHint(QCP::phForceRepaint);
05818 #endif
05819   setAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone);
05820   setNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeNone);
05821   setInteractions(iRangeDrag|iRangeZoom);
05822   setMultiSelectModifier(Qt::ControlModifier);
05823   setRangeDragAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
05824   setRangeZoomAxes(xAxis, yAxis);
05825   setRangeDrag(0);
05826   setRangeZoom(0);
05827   setRangeZoomFactor(0.85);
05828   setSelectionTolerance(8);
05829   
05830   setMargin(0, 0, 0, 0); // also initializes the mAxisRect
05831   setAutoMargin(true);
05832   replot();
05833 }
05834 
05835 QCustomPlot::~QCustomPlot()
05836 {
05837   clearPlottables();
05838   clearItems();
05839   delete legend;
05840   delete xAxis;
05841   delete yAxis;
05842   delete xAxis2;
05843   delete yAxis2;
05844   qDeleteAll(mLayers);
05845   mLayers.clear();
05846 }
05847 
05852 QCPAxis *QCustomPlot::rangeDragAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation)
05853 {
05854   return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeDragHorzAxis : mRangeDragVertAxis);
05855 }
05856 
05861 QCPAxis *QCustomPlot::rangeZoomAxis(Qt::Orientation orientation)
05862 {
05863   return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomHorzAxis : mRangeZoomVertAxis);
05864 }
05865 
05870 double QCustomPlot::rangeZoomFactor(Qt::Orientation orientation)
05871 {
05872   return (orientation == Qt::Horizontal ? mRangeZoomFactorHorz : mRangeZoomFactorVert);
05873 }

05904 }
05905 
05917 void QCustomPlot::setAxisRect(const QRect &arect)
05918 {
05919   mMarginLeft = arect.left()-mViewport.left();
05920   mMarginRight = mViewport.right()-arect.right();
05921   mMarginTop = arect.top()-mViewport.top();
05922   mMarginBottom = mViewport.bottom()-arect.bottom();
05923   updateAxisRect();
05924 }
05925 
05930 void QCustomPlot::setMarginLeft(int margin)
05931 {
05932   mMarginLeft = margin;
05933   updateAxisRect();
05934 }
05935 
05940 void QCustomPlot::setMarginRight(int margin)
05941 {
05942   mMarginRight = margin;
05943   updateAxisRect();
05944 }
05945 
05950 void QCustomPlot::setMarginTop(int margin)
05951 {
05952   mMarginTop = margin;
05953   updateAxisRect();
05954 }
05955 
05960 void QCustomPlot::setMarginBottom(int margin)
05961 {
05962   mMarginBottom = margin;
05963   updateAxisRect();
05964 }
05965 
05973 void QCustomPlot::setMargin(int left, int right, int top, int bottom)
05974 {
05975   mMarginLeft = left;
05976   mMarginRight = right;
05977   mMarginTop = top;
05978   mMarginBottom = bottom;
05979   updateAxisRect();
05980 }

06091 void QCustomPlot::setRangeZoomFactor(double factor)
06092 {
06093   mRangeZoomFactorHorz = factor;
06094   mRangeZoomFactorVert = factor;
06095 }
06096 
06111 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &antialiasedElements)
06112 {
06113   mAntialiasedElements = antialiasedElements;
06114   
06115   // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
06116   if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
06117     mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
06118 }
06119 
06134 void QCustomPlot::setAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement antialiasedElement, bool enabled)
06135 {
06136   if (!enabled && mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
06137     mAntialiasedElements &= ~antialiasedElement;
06138   else if (enabled && !mAntialiasedElements.testFlag(antialiasedElement))
06139     mAntialiasedElements |= antialiasedElement;
06140   
06141   // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
06142   if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
06143     mNotAntialiasedElements |= ~mAntialiasedElements;
06144 }
06145 
06164 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElements(const QCP::AntialiasedElements &notAntialiasedElements)
06165 {
06166   mNotAntialiasedElements = notAntialiasedElements;
06167   
06168   // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
06169   if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
06170     mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
06171 }
06172 
06190 void QCustomPlot::setNotAntialiasedElement(QCP::AntialiasedElement notAntialiasedElement, bool enabled)
06191 {
06192   if (!enabled && mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
06193     mNotAntialiasedElements &= ~notAntialiasedElement;
06194   else if (enabled && !mNotAntialiasedElements.testFlag(notAntialiasedElement))
06195     mNotAntialiasedElements |= notAntialiasedElement;
06196   
06197   // make sure elements aren't in mNotAntialiasedElements and mAntialiasedElements simultaneously:
06198   if ((mNotAntialiasedElements & mAntialiasedElements) != 0)
06199     mAntialiasedElements |= ~mNotAntialiasedElements;
06200 }
06201 
06208 void QCustomPlot::setAutoAddPlottableToLegend(bool on)
06209 {
06210   mAutoAddPlottableToLegend = on;
06211 }
06212 
06221 void QCustomPlot::setAxisBackground(const QPixmap &pm)
06222 {
06223   mAxisBackground = pm;
06224   mScaledAxisBackground = QPixmap();
06225 }
06226 
06232 void QCustomPlot::setAxisBackground(const QPixmap &pm, bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)
06233 {
06234   mAxisBackground = pm;
06235   mScaledAxisBackground = QPixmap();
06236   mAxisBackgroundScaled = scaled;
06237   mAxisBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
06238 }
06239 
06251 void QCustomPlot::setAxisBackgroundScaled(bool scaled)
06252 {
06253   mAxisBackgroundScaled = scaled;
06254 }
06255 
06261 void QCustomPlot::setAxisBackgroundScaledMode(Qt::AspectRatioMode mode)
06262 {
06263   mAxisBackgroundScaledMode = mode;
06264 }
06265 
06318 void QCustomPlot::setInteractions(const Interactions &interactions)
06319 {
06320   mInteractions = interactions;
06321 }
06322 
06330 void QCustomPlot::setInteraction(const QCustomPlot::Interaction &interaction, bool enabled)
06331 {
06332   if (!enabled && mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
06333     mInteractions &= ~interaction;
06334   else if (enabled && !mInteractions.testFlag(interaction))
06335     mInteractions |= interaction;
06336 }
06337 
06351 void QCustomPlot::setSelectionTolerance(int pixels)
06352 {
06353   mSelectionTolerance = pixels;
06354 }
06355 
06361 void QCustomPlot::setSelectedTitleFont(const QFont &font)
06362 {
06363   mSelectedTitleFont = font;
06364 }

06371 void QCustomPlot::setSelectedTitleColor(const QColor &color)
06372 {
06373   mSelectedTitleColor = color;
06374 }

06381 void QCustomPlot::setTitleSelected(bool selected)
06382 {
06383   mTitleSelected = selected;
06384 }
06385 
06395 void QCustomPlot::setNoAntialiasingOnDrag(bool enabled)
06396 {
06397   mNoAntialiasingOnDrag = enabled;
06398 }
06399 
06404 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHints(const QCP::PlottingHints &hints)
06405 {
06406   mPlottingHints = hints;
06407 }
06408 
06413 void QCustomPlot::setPlottingHint(QCP::PlottingHint hint, bool enabled)
06414 {
06415   QCP::PlottingHints newHints = mPlottingHints;
06416   if (!enabled)
06417     newHints &= ~hint;
06418   else
06419     newHints |= hint;
06420   
06421   if (newHints != mPlottingHints)
06422     setPlottingHints(newHints);
06423 }
06424 
06435 void QCustomPlot::setMultiSelectModifier(Qt::KeyboardModifier modifier)
06436 {
06437   mMultiSelectModifier = modifier;
06438 }
06439 
06448 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable(int index)
06449 {
06450   if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size())
06451   {
06452     return mPlottables.at(index);
06453   } else
06454   {
06455     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
06456     return 0;
06457   }
06458 }
06459 
06467 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottable()
06468 {
06469   if (!mPlottables.isEmpty())
06470   {
06471     return mPlottables.last();
06472   } else
06473     return 0;
06474 }
06475 
06486 bool QCustomPlot::addPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
06487 {
06488   if (mPlottables.contains(plottable))
06489   {
06490     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable already added to this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
06491     return false;
06492   }
06493   if (plottable->parentPlot() != this)
06494   {
06495     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not created with this QCustomPlot as parent:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
06496     return false;
06497   }
06498   
06499   mPlottables.append(plottable);
06500   // possibly add plottable to legend:
06501   if (mAutoAddPlottableToLegend)
06502     plottable->addToLegend();
06503   // special handling for QCPGraphs to maintain the simple graph interface:
06504   if (QCPGraph *graph = qobject_cast<QCPGraph*>(plottable))
06505     mGraphs.append(graph);
06506   if (!plottable->layer()) // usually the layer is already set in the constructor of the plottable (via QCPLayerable constructor)
06507     plottable->setLayer(currentLayer());
06508   return true;
06509 }
06510 
06518 bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable)
06519 {
06520   if (!mPlottables.contains(plottable))
06521   {
06522     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "plottable not in list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(plottable);
06523     return false;
06524   }
06525   
06526   // remove plottable from legend:
06527   plottable->removeFromLegend();
06528   // special handling for QCPGraphs to maintain the simple graph interface:
06529   if (QCPGraph *graph = qobject_cast<QCPGraph*>(plottable))
06530     mGraphs.removeOne(graph);
06531   // remove plottable:
06532   delete plottable;
06533   mPlottables.removeOne(plottable);
06534   return true;
06535 }
06536 
06541 bool QCustomPlot::removePlottable(int index)
06542 {
06543   if (index >= 0 && index < mPlottables.size())
06544     return removePlottable(mPlottables[index]);
06545   else
06546   {
06547     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
06548     return false;
06549   }
06550 }
06551 
06559 int QCustomPlot::clearPlottables()
06560 {
06561   int c = mPlottables.size();
06562   for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
06563     removePlottable(mPlottables[i]);
06564   return c;
06565 }
06566 
06572 int QCustomPlot::plottableCount() const
06573 {
06574   return mPlottables.size();
06575 }
06576 
06584 QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> QCustomPlot::selectedPlottables() const
06585 {
06586   QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> result;
06587   for (int i=0; i<mPlottables.size(); ++i)
06588   {
06589     if (mPlottables.at(i)->selected())
06590       result.append(mPlottables.at(i));
06591   }
06592   return result;
06593 }
06594 
06605 QCPAbstractPlottable *QCustomPlot::plottableAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable) const
06606 {
06607   QCPAbstractPlottable *resultPlottable = 0;
06608   double resultDistance = mSelectionTolerance; // only regard clicks with distances smaller than mSelectionTolerance as selections, so initialize with that value
06609   
06610   for (int i=0; i<mPlottables.size(); ++i)
06611   {
06612     QCPAbstractPlottable *currentPlottable = mPlottables[i];
06613     if (onlySelectable && !currentPlottable->selectable())
06614       continue;
06615     if ((currentPlottable->keyAxis()->axisRect() | currentPlottable->valueAxis()->axisRect()).contains(pos.toPoint())) // only consider clicks inside the rect that is spanned by the plottable's key/value axes
06616     {
06617       double currentDistance = currentPlottable->selectTest(pos);
06618       if (currentDistance >= 0 && currentDistance < resultDistance)
06619       {
06620         resultPlottable = currentPlottable;
06621         resultDistance = currentDistance;
06622       }
06623     }
06624   }
06625   
06626   return resultPlottable;
06627 }
06628 
06634 bool QCustomPlot::hasPlottable(QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
06635 {
06636   return mPlottables.contains(plottable);
06637 }
06638 
06647 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::graph(int index) const
06648 {
06649   if (index >= 0 && index < mGraphs.size())
06650   {
06651     return mGraphs.at(index);
06652   } else
06653   {
06654     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
06655     return 0;
06656   }
06657 }
06658 
06666 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::graph() const
06667 {
06668   if (!mGraphs.isEmpty())
06669   {
06670     return mGraphs.last();
06671   } else
06672     return 0;
06673 }
06674 
06687 QCPGraph *QCustomPlot::addGraph(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis)
06688 {
06689   if (!keyAxis) keyAxis = xAxis;
06690   if (!valueAxis) valueAxis = yAxis;
06691   if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != this || valueAxis->parentPlot() != this)
06692   {
06693     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed keyAxis or valueAxis doesn't have this QCustomPlot as parent";
06694     return 0;
06695   }
06696   
06697   QCPGraph *newGraph = new QCPGraph(keyAxis, valueAxis);
06698   if (addPlottable(newGraph))
06699   {
06700     newGraph->setName("Graph "+QString::number(mGraphs.size()));
06701     return newGraph;
06702   } else
06703   {
06704     delete newGraph;
06705     return 0;
06706   }
06707 }
06708 
06718 bool QCustomPlot::removeGraph(QCPGraph *graph)
06719 {
06720   return removePlottable(graph);
06721 }
06722 
06727 bool QCustomPlot::removeGraph(int index)
06728 {
06729   if (index >= 0 && index < mGraphs.size())
06730     return removeGraph(mGraphs[index]);
06731   else
06732     return false;
06733 }
06734 
06740 int QCustomPlot::clearGraphs()
06741 {
06742   int c = mGraphs.size();
