06743   for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
06744     removeGraph(mGraphs[i]);
06745   return c;
06746 }
06747 
06753 int QCustomPlot::graphCount() const
06754 {
06755   return mGraphs.size();
06756 }
06757 
06767 QList<QCPGraph*> QCustomPlot::selectedGraphs() const
06768 {
06769   QList<QCPGraph*> result;
06770   for (int i=0; i<mGraphs.size(); ++i)
06771   {
06772     if (mGraphs.at(i)->selected())
06773       result.append(mGraphs.at(i));
06774   }
06775   return result;
06776 }
06777 
06786 QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::item(int index) const
06787 {
06788   if (index >= 0 && index < mItems.size())
06789   {
06790     return mItems.at(index);
06791   } else
06792   {
06793     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
06794     return 0;
06795   }
06796 }
06797 
06805 QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::item() const
06806 {
06807   if (!mItems.isEmpty())
06808   {
06809     return mItems.last();
06810   } else
06811     return 0;
06812 }
06813 
06822 bool QCustomPlot::addItem(QCPAbstractItem *item)
06823 {
06824   if (!mItems.contains(item) && item->parentPlot() == this)
06825   {
06826     mItems.append(item);
06827     return true;
06828   } else
06829   {
06830     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "item either already in list or not created with this QCustomPlot as parent:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
06831     return false;
06832   }
06833 }
06834 
06842 bool QCustomPlot::removeItem(QCPAbstractItem *item)
06843 {
06844   if (mItems.contains(item))
06845   {
06846     delete item;
06847     mItems.removeOne(item);
06848     return true;
06849   } else
06850   {
06851     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "item not in list:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(item);
06852     return false;
06853   }
06854 }
06855 
06860 bool QCustomPlot::removeItem(int index)
06861 {
06862   if (index >= 0 && index < mItems.size())
06863     return removeItem(mItems[index]);
06864   else
06865   {
06866     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
06867     return false;
06868   }
06869 }
06870 
06878 int QCustomPlot::clearItems()
06879 {
06880   int c = mItems.size();
06881   for (int i=c-1; i >= 0; --i)
06882     removeItem(mItems[i]);
06883   return c;
06884 }
06885 
06891 int QCustomPlot::itemCount() const
06892 {
06893   return mItems.size();
06894 }
06895 
06901 QList<QCPAbstractItem*> QCustomPlot::selectedItems() const
06902 {
06903   QList<QCPAbstractItem*> result;
06904   for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); ++i)
06905   {
06906     if (mItems.at(i)->selected())
06907       result.append(mItems.at(i));
06908   }
06909   return result;
06910 }
06911 
06923 QCPAbstractItem *QCustomPlot::itemAt(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable) const
06924 {
06925   QCPAbstractItem *resultItem = 0;
06926   double resultDistance = mSelectionTolerance; // only regard clicks with distances smaller than mSelectionTolerance as selections, so initialize with that value
06927   
06928   for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); ++i)
06929   {
06930     QCPAbstractItem *currentItem = mItems[i];
06931     if (onlySelectable && !currentItem->selectable())
06932       continue;
06933     if (!currentItem->clipToAxisRect() || currentItem->clipRect().contains(pos.toPoint())) // only consider clicks inside axis cliprect of the item if actually clipped to it
06934     {
06935       double currentDistance = currentItem->selectTest(pos);
06936       if (currentDistance >= 0 && currentDistance < resultDistance)
06937       {
06938         resultItem = currentItem;
06939         resultDistance = currentDistance;
06940       }
06941     }
06942   }
06943   
06944   return resultItem;
06945 }
06946 
06952 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::layer(const QString &name) const
06953 {
06954   for (int i=0; i<mLayers.size(); ++i)
06955   {
06956     if (mLayers.at(i)->name() == name)
06957       return mLayers.at(i);
06958   }
06959   return 0;
06960 }
06961 
06968 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::layer(int index) const
06969 {
06970   if (index >= 0 && index < mLayers.size())
06971   {
06972     return mLayers.at(index);
06973   } else
06974   {
06975     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "index out of bounds:" << index;
06976     return 0;
06977   }
06978 }
06979 
06983 QCPLayer *QCustomPlot::currentLayer() const
06984 {
06985   return mCurrentLayer; 
06986 }
06987 
06997 bool QCustomPlot::setCurrentLayer(const QString &name)
06998 {
06999   if (QCPLayer *newCurrentLayer = layer(name))
07000   {
07001     return setCurrentLayer(newCurrentLayer);
07002   } else
07003   {
07004     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer with name doesn't exist:" << name;
07005     return false;
07006   }
07007 }
07008 
07017 bool QCustomPlot::setCurrentLayer(QCPLayer *layer)
07018 {
07019   if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
07020   {
07021     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
07022     return false;
07023   }
07024   
07025   mCurrentLayer = layer;
07026   return true;
07027 }
07028 
07034 int QCustomPlot::layerCount() const
07035 {
07036   return mLayers.size();
07037 }
07038 
07052 bool QCustomPlot::addLayer(const QString &name, QCPLayer *otherLayer, QCustomPlot::LayerInsertMode insertMode)
07053 {
07054   if (!otherLayer)
07055     otherLayer = mLayers.last();
07056   if (!mLayers.contains(otherLayer))
07057   {
07058     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "otherLayer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(otherLayer);
07059     return false;
07060   }
07061   if (layer(name))
07062   {
07063     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "A layer exists already with the name" << name;
07064     return false;
07065   }
07066     
07067   QCPLayer *newLayer = new QCPLayer(this, name);
07068   mLayers.insert(otherLayer->index() + (insertMode==limAbove ? 1:0), newLayer);
07069   return true;
07070 }
07071 
07086 bool QCustomPlot::removeLayer(QCPLayer *layer)
07087 {
07088   if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
07089   {
07090     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
07091     return false;
07092   }
07093   if (!mLayers.size() > 1)
07094   {
07095     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "can't remove last layer";
07096     return false;
07097   }
07098   
07099   // append all children of this layer to layer below (if this is lowest layer, prepend to layer above)
07100   int removedIndex = layer->index();
07101   bool isFirstLayer = removedIndex==0;
07102   QCPLayer *targetLayer = isFirstLayer ? mLayers.at(removedIndex+1) : mLayers.at(removedIndex-1);
07103   QList<QCPLayerable*> children = layer->children();
07104   if (isFirstLayer) // prepend in reverse order (so order relative to each other stays the same)
07105   {
07106     for (int i=children.size()-1; i>=0; --i)
07107       children.at(i)->moveToLayer(targetLayer, true);
07108   } else  // append normally
07109   {
07110     for (int i=0; i<children.size(); ++i)
07111       children.at(i)->moveToLayer(targetLayer, false);
07112   }
07113   // if removed layer is current layer, change current layer to layer below/above:
07114   if (layer == mCurrentLayer)
07115     setCurrentLayer(targetLayer);
07116   // remove layer:
07117   delete layer;
07118   mLayers.removeOne(layer);
07119   return true;
07120 }
07121 
07131 bool QCustomPlot::moveLayer(QCPLayer *layer, QCPLayer *otherLayer, QCustomPlot::LayerInsertMode insertMode)
07132 {
07133   if (!mLayers.contains(layer))
07134   {
07135     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "layer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(layer);
07136     return false;
07137   }
07138   if (!mLayers.contains(otherLayer))
07139   {
07140     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "otherLayer not a layer of this QCustomPlot:" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(otherLayer);
07141     return false;
07142   }
07143   
07144   mLayers.move(layer->index(), otherLayer->index() + (insertMode==limAbove ? 1:0));
07145   return true;
07146 }
07147 
07153 QList<QCPAxis*> QCustomPlot::selectedAxes() const
07154 {
07155   QList<QCPAxis*> result = QList<QCPAxis*>() << xAxis << yAxis << xAxis2 << yAxis2;
07156   for (int i=result.size()-1; i>=0; --i)
07157   {
07158     if (result.at(i)->selected() == QCPAxis::spNone)
07159       result.removeAt(i);
07160   }
07161   return result;
07162 }
07163 
07170 QList<QCPLegend*> QCustomPlot::selectedLegends() const
07171 {
07172   /* for now, we only have the one legend. Maybe later, there will be a mechanism to have more. */
07173   QList<QCPLegend*> result;
07174   if (legend->selected() != QCPLegend::spNone)
07175     result.append(legend);
07176   return result;
07177 }
07178 
07188 void QCustomPlot::deselectAll()
07189 {
07190   // deselect plottables:
07191   QList<QCPAbstractPlottable*> selPlottables = selectedPlottables();
07192   for (int i=0; i<selPlottables.size(); ++i)
07193     selPlottables.at(i)->setSelected(false);
07194   
07195   // deselect items:
07196   QList<QCPAbstractItem*> selItems = selectedItems();
07197   for (int i=0; i<selItems.size(); ++i)
07198     selItems.at(i)->setSelected(false);
07199   
07200   // deselect axes:
07201   QList<QCPAxis*> selAxes = selectedAxes();
07202   for (int i=0; i<selAxes.size(); ++i)
07203     selAxes.at(i)->setSelected(QCPAxis::spNone);
07204   
07205   // deselect legend (and legend items):
07206   legend->setSelected(QCPLegend::spNone);
07207   
07208   // deselect title:
07209   setTitleSelected(false);
07210 }
07211 
07220 void QCustomPlot::replot()
07221 {
07222   if (mReplotting) // incase signals loop back to replot slot
07223     return;
07224   mReplotting = true;
07225   emit beforeReplot();
07226   mPaintBuffer.fill(mColor);
07227   QCPPainter painter;
07228   painter.begin(&mPaintBuffer);
07229   if (painter.isActive()) 
07230   {
07231     painter.setRenderHint(QPainter::HighQualityAntialiasing);
07232     draw(&painter);
07233     if (mPlottingHints.testFlag(QCP::phForceRepaint))
07234       repaint();
07235     else
07236       update();
07237     painter.end();
07238   } else // might happen if QCustomPlot has width or height zero
07239     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Couldn't activate painter on buffer";
07240   emit afterReplot();
07241   mReplotting = false;
07242 }
07243 
07264 void QCustomPlot::setupFullAxesBox()
07265 {
07266   xAxis2->setVisible(true);
07267   yAxis2->setVisible(true);
07268   
07269   xAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
07270   yAxis2->setTickLabels(false);
07271   
07272   xAxis2->setAutoSubTicks(xAxis->autoSubTicks());
07273   yAxis2->setAutoSubTicks(yAxis->autoSubTicks());
07274   
07275   xAxis2->setAutoTickCount(xAxis->autoTickCount());
07276   yAxis2->setAutoTickCount(yAxis->autoTickCount());
07277   
07278   xAxis2->setAutoTickStep(xAxis->autoTickStep());
07279   yAxis2->setAutoTickStep(yAxis->autoTickStep());
07280   
07281   xAxis2->setScaleType(xAxis->scaleType());
07282   yAxis2->setScaleType(yAxis->scaleType());
07283   
07284   xAxis2->setScaleLogBase(xAxis->scaleLogBase());
07285   yAxis2->setScaleLogBase(yAxis->scaleLogBase());
07286   
07287   xAxis2->setTicks(xAxis->ticks());
07288   yAxis2->setTicks(yAxis->ticks());
07289   
07290   xAxis2->setSubTickCount(xAxis->subTickCount());
07291   yAxis2->setSubTickCount(yAxis->subTickCount());
07292   
07293   xAxis2->setTickStep(xAxis->tickStep());
07294   yAxis2->setTickStep(yAxis->tickStep());
07295   
07296   xAxis2->setRange(xAxis->range());
07297   yAxis2->setRange(yAxis->range());
07298   
07299   xAxis2->setRangeReversed(xAxis->rangeReversed());
07300   yAxis2->setRangeReversed(yAxis->rangeReversed());
07301 }
07302 
07309 void QCustomPlot::rescaleAxes()
07310 {
07311   if (mPlottables.isEmpty()) return;
07312   
07313   mPlottables.at(0)->rescaleAxes(false); // onlyEnlarge disabled on first plottable
07314   for (int i=1; i<mPlottables.size(); ++i)
07315     mPlottables.at(i)->rescaleAxes(true);  // onlyEnlarge enabled on all other plottables
07316 }
07317 
07349 bool QCustomPlot::savePdf(const QString &fileName, bool noCosmeticPen, int width, int height)
07350 {
07351   bool success = false;
07352   int newWidth, newHeight;
07353   if (width == 0 || height == 0)
07354   {
07355     newWidth = this->width();
07356     newHeight = this->height();
07357   } else
07358   {
07359     newWidth = width;
07360     newHeight = height;
07361   }
07362   
07363   QPrinter printer(QPrinter::ScreenResolution);
07364   printer.setOutputFileName(fileName);
07365   printer.setFullPage(true);
07366   QRect oldViewport = mViewport;
07367   mViewport = QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight);
07368   updateAxisRect();
07369   printer.setPaperSize(mViewport.size(), QPrinter::DevicePixel);
07370   QCPPainter printpainter;
07371   if (printpainter.begin(&printer))
07372   {
07373     printpainter.setPdfExportMode(true);
07374     printpainter.setWindow(mViewport);
07375     printpainter.setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefaultPen, noCosmeticPen);
07376     if (mColor != Qt::white && mColor != Qt::transparent && mColor.alpha() > 0) // draw pdf background color if not white/transparent
07377       printpainter.fillRect(mViewport, mColor);
07378     draw(&printpainter);
07379     printpainter.end();
07380     success = true;
07381   }
07382   mViewport = oldViewport;
07383   updateAxisRect();
07384   return success;
07385 }
07386 
07420 bool QCustomPlot::savePng(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, int quality)
07421 {  
07422   return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "PNG", quality);
07423 }
07424 
07455 bool QCustomPlot::saveJpg(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, int quality)
07456 {
07457   return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "JPG", quality);
07458 }
07459 
07487 bool QCustomPlot::saveBmp(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale)
07488 {
07489   return saveRastered(fileName, width, height, scale, "BMP");
07490 }
07491 
07501 QSize QCustomPlot::minimumSizeHint() const
07502 {
07503   return QSize(50, 50);
07504 }
07505 
07511 void QCustomPlot::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event)
07512 {
07513   Q_UNUSED(event);
07514   QPainter painter(this);
07515   painter.drawPixmap(0, 0, mPaintBuffer);
07516 }
07517 
07524 void QCustomPlot::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *event)
07525 {
07526   // resize and repaint the buffer:
07527   mPaintBuffer = QPixmap(event->size());
07528   mViewport = rect();
07529   updateAxisRect();
07530   replot();
07531 }
07532 
07537 void QCustomPlot::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
07538 {
07539   emit mouseDoubleClick(event);
07540   
07541   // emit specialized object double click signals:
07542   bool foundHit = false;
07543   // for legend:
07544   if (receivers(SIGNAL(legendDoubleClick(QCPLegend*,QCPAbstractLegendItem*,QMouseEvent*))) > 0)
07545   {
07546     if (legend->selectTestLegend(event->pos()))
07547     {
07548       emit legendDoubleClick(legend, legend->selectTestItem(event->pos()), event);
07549       foundHit = true;
07550     }
07551   }
07552   // for plottables:
07553   if (!foundHit && receivers(SIGNAL(plottableDoubleClick(QCPAbstractPlottable*,QMouseEvent*))) > 0)
07554   {
07555     if (QCPAbstractPlottable *ap = plottableAt(event->pos(), false))
07556     {
07557       emit plottableDoubleClick(ap, event);
07558       foundHit = true;
07559     }
07560   }
07561   // for items:
07562   if (!foundHit && receivers(SIGNAL(itemDoubleClick(QCPAbstractItem*,QMouseEvent*))) > 0)
07563   {
07564     if (QCPAbstractItem *ai = itemAt(event->pos(), false))
07565     {
07566       emit itemDoubleClick(ai, event);
07567       foundHit = true;
07568     }
07569   }
07570   // for axes:
07571   if (!foundHit && receivers(SIGNAL(axisDoubleClick(QCPAxis*,QCPAxis::SelectablePart,QMouseEvent*))) > 0)
07572   {
07573     QVector<QCPAxis*> axes = QVector<QCPAxis*>() << xAxis << yAxis << xAxis2 << yAxis2;
07574     for (int i=0; i<axes.size(); ++i)
07575     {
07576       QCPAxis::SelectablePart part = axes.at(i)->selectTest(event->pos());
07577       if (part != QCPAxis::spNone)
07578       {
07579         foundHit = true;
07580         emit axisDoubleClick(axes.at(i), part, event);
07581         break;
07582       }
07583     }
07584   }
07585   // for title:
07586   if (!foundHit && receivers(SIGNAL(titleDoubleClick(QMouseEvent*))) > 0)
07587   {
07588     if (selectTestTitle(event->pos()))
07589     {
07590       emit titleDoubleClick(event);
07591       foundHit = true;
07592     }
07593   }
07594 }
07595 
07607 void QCustomPlot::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
07608 {
07609   emit mousePress(event);
07610   mDragStart = event->pos(); // need this even when not LeftButton is pressed, to determine in releaseEvent whether it was a full click (no position change between press and release)
07611   if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
07612   {
07613     mDragging = true;
07614     // initialize antialiasing backup in case we start dragging:
07615     if (mNoAntialiasingOnDrag)
07616     {
07617       mAADragBackup = antialiasedElements();
07618       mNotAADragBackup = notAntialiasedElements();
07619     }
07620     // Mouse range dragging interaction:
07621     if (mInteractions.testFlag(iRangeDrag))
07622     {
07623       mDragStartHorzRange = mRangeDragHorzAxis->range();
07624       mDragStartVertRange = mRangeDragVertAxis->range();
07625     }
07626   }
07627   
07628   QWidget::mousePressEvent(event);
07629 }
07630 
07638 void QCustomPlot::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
07639 {
07640   emit mouseMove(event);
07641 
07642   // Mouse range dragging interaction:
07643   if (mInteractions.testFlag(iRangeDrag))
07644   {
07645     if (mDragging)
07646     {
07647       if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
07648       {
07649         if (mRangeDragHorzAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
07650         {
07651           double diff = mRangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.x()) - mRangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
07652           mRangeDragHorzAxis->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.lower+diff, mDragStartHorzRange.upper+diff);
07653         } else if (mRangeDragHorzAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
07654         {
07655           double diff = mRangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.x()) / mRangeDragHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x());
07656           mRangeDragHorzAxis->setRange(mDragStartHorzRange.lower*diff, mDragStartHorzRange.upper*diff);
07657         }
07658       }
07659       if (mRangeDrag.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
07660       {
07661         if (mRangeDragVertAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
07662         {
07663           double diff = mRangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.y()) - mRangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
07664           mRangeDragVertAxis->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.lower+diff, mDragStartVertRange.upper+diff);
07665         } else if (mRangeDragVertAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
07666         {
07667           double diff = mRangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(mDragStart.y()) / mRangeDragVertAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y());
07668           mRangeDragVertAxis->setRange(mDragStartVertRange.lower*diff, mDragStartVertRange.upper*diff);
07669         }
07670       }
07671       if (mRangeDrag != 0) // if either vertical or horizontal drag was enabled, do a replot
07672       {
07673         if (mNoAntialiasingOnDrag)
07674           setNotAntialiasedElements(QCP::aeAll);
07675         replot();
07676       }
07677     }
07678   }
07679   
07680   QWidget::mouseMoveEvent(event);
07681 }
07682 
07690 void QCustomPlot::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
07691 {
07692   emit mouseRelease(event);
07693   mDragging = false;
07694   bool doReplot = false;
07695   if (mNoAntialiasingOnDrag)
07696   {
07697     setAntialiasedElements(mAADragBackup);
07698     setNotAntialiasedElements(mNotAADragBackup);
07699     doReplot = true;
07700   }
07701   
07702   // determine whether it was a drag or click operation:
07703   if ((mDragStart-event->pos()).manhattanLength() < 5) // was a click
07704   {
07705     // Mouse selection interaction:
07706     if ((mInteractions & (iSelectPlottables|iSelectItems|iSelectAxes|iSelectLegend|iSelectTitle)) > 0 
07707         && event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
07708     {
07709       bool selectionFound = false;
07710       bool emitChangedSignal = false;
07711       bool additiveSelection = mInteractions.testFlag(iMultiSelect) && event->modifiers().testFlag(mMultiSelectModifier);
07712       // Mouse selection of legend:
07713       if (mInteractions.testFlag(iSelectLegend))
07714         selectionFound |= legend->handleLegendSelection(event, additiveSelection, emitChangedSignal);
07715       // Mouse selection of plottables:
07716       if (mInteractions.testFlag(iSelectPlottables))
07717         selectionFound |= handlePlottableSelection((!selectionFound || additiveSelection) ? event : 0, additiveSelection, emitChangedSignal);
07718       // Mouse selection of items:
07719       if (mInteractions.testFlag(iSelectItems))
07720         selectionFound |= handleItemSelection((!selectionFound || additiveSelection) ? event : 0, additiveSelection, emitChangedSignal);
07721       // Mouse selection of axes:
07722       if (mInteractions.testFlag(iSelectAxes))
07723         selectionFound |= handleAxisSelection((!selectionFound || additiveSelection) ? event : 0, additiveSelection, emitChangedSignal);
07724       // Mouse selection of title:
07725       if (mInteractions.testFlag(iSelectTitle))
07726         selectionFound |= handleTitleSelection((!selectionFound || additiveSelection) ? event : 0, additiveSelection, emitChangedSignal);
07727       
07728       if (emitChangedSignal)
07729         emit selectionChangedByUser();
07730       doReplot = true;
07731     }
07732     
07733     // emit specialized object click signals:
07734     bool foundHit = false;
07735     // for legend:
07736     if (receivers(SIGNAL(legendClick(QCPLegend*,QCPAbstractLegendItem*,QMouseEvent*))) > 0)
07737     {
07738       if (legend->selectTestLegend(event->pos()))
07739       {
07740         emit legendClick(legend, legend->selectTestItem(event->pos()), event);
07741         foundHit = true;
07742       }
07743     }
07744     // for plottables:
07745     if (!foundHit && receivers(SIGNAL(plottableClick(QCPAbstractPlottable*,QMouseEvent*))) > 0)
07746     {
07747       if (QCPAbstractPlottable *ap = plottableAt(event->pos(), false))
07748       {
07749         emit plottableClick(ap, event);
07750         foundHit = true;
07751       }
07752     }
07753     // for items:
07754     if (!foundHit && receivers(SIGNAL(itemClick(QCPAbstractItem*,QMouseEvent*))) > 0)
07755     {
07756       if (QCPAbstractItem *ai = itemAt(event->pos(), false))
07757       {
07758         emit itemClick(ai, event);
07759         foundHit = true;
07760       }
07761     }
07762     // for axes:
07763     if (!foundHit && receivers(SIGNAL(axisClick(QCPAxis*,QCPAxis::SelectablePart,QMouseEvent*))) > 0)
07764     {
07765       QVector<QCPAxis*> axes = QVector<QCPAxis*>() << xAxis << yAxis << xAxis2 << yAxis2;
07766       for (int i=0; i<axes.size(); ++i)
07767       {
07768         QCPAxis::SelectablePart part = axes.at(i)->selectTest(event->pos());
07769         if (part != QCPAxis::spNone)
07770         {
07771           foundHit = true;
07772           emit axisClick(axes.at(i), part, event);
07773           break;
07774         }
07775       }
07776     }
07777     // for title:
07778     if (!foundHit && receivers(SIGNAL(titleClick(QMouseEvent*))) > 0)
07779     {
07780       if (selectTestTitle(event->pos()))
07781       {
07782         emit titleClick(event);
07783         foundHit = true;
07784       }
07785     }
07786   } // was a click end
07787   
07788   if (doReplot)
07789     replot();
07790   
07791   QWidget::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
07792 }
07793 
07810 void QCustomPlot::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
07811 {
07812   emit mouseWheel(event);
07813   
07814   // Mouse range zooming interaction:
07815   if (mInteractions.testFlag(iRangeZoom))
07816   {
07817     if (mRangeZoom != 0)
07818     {
07819       double factor;
07820       double wheelSteps = event->delta()/120.0; // a single step delta is +/-120 usually
07821       if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Horizontal))
07822       {
07823         factor = pow(mRangeZoomFactorHorz, wheelSteps);
07824         mRangeZoomHorzAxis->scaleRange(factor, mRangeZoomHorzAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().x()));
07825       }
07826       if (mRangeZoom.testFlag(Qt::Vertical))
07827       {
07828         factor = pow(mRangeZoomFactorVert, wheelSteps);
07829         mRangeZoomVertAxis->scaleRange(factor, mRangeZoomVertAxis->pixelToCoord(event->pos().y()));
07830       }
07831       replot();
07832     }
07833   }
07834   
07835   QWidget::wheelEvent(event);
07836 }
07837 
07855 bool QCustomPlot::handlePlottableSelection(QMouseEvent *event, bool additiveSelection, bool &modified)
07856 {
07857   // Note: This code is basically identical to handleItemSelection, only for plottables
07858   
07859   bool selectionFound = false;
07860   if (event)
07861   {
07862     QCPAbstractPlottable *plottableSelection = plottableAt(event->pos(), true);
07863     // handle selection of found plottable:
07864     if (plottableSelection)
07865     {
07866       selectionFound = true;
07867       if (!plottableSelection->selected() || additiveSelection)
07868       {
07869         plottableSelection->setSelected(!plottableSelection->selected());
07870         modified = true;
07871       }
07872     }
07873     // deselect all others (if plottableSelection is 0, all plottables are deselected):
07874     if (!additiveSelection)
07875     {
07876       for (int i=0; i<mPlottables.size(); ++i)
07877       {
07878         if (mPlottables.at(i) != plottableSelection && mPlottables.at(i)->selected() && mPlottables.at(i)->selectable())
07879         {
07880           mPlottables.at(i)->setSelected(false);
07881           modified = true;
07882         }
07883       }
07884     }
07885   } else // event == 0, so deselect selectable plottables
07886   {
07887     for (int i=0; i<mPlottables.size(); ++i)
07888     {
07889       if (mPlottables.at(i)->selected() && mPlottables.at(i)->selectable())
07890       {
07891         mPlottables.at(i)->setSelected(false);
07892         modified = true;
07893       }
07894     }
07895   }
07896   return selectionFound;
07897 }
07898 
07916 bool QCustomPlot::handleItemSelection(QMouseEvent *event, bool additiveSelection, bool &modified)
07917 {
07918   // Note: This code is basically identical to handlePlottableSelection, only for items
07919   
07920   bool selectionFound = false;
07921   if (event)
07922   {
07923     QCPAbstractItem *itemSelection = itemAt(event->pos(), true);
07924     // handle selection of found plottable:
07925     if (itemSelection)
07926     {
07927       selectionFound = true;
07928       if (!itemSelection->selected() || additiveSelection)
07929       {
07930         itemSelection->setSelected(!itemSelection->selected());
07931         modified = true;
07932       }
07933     }
07934     // deselect all others (if itemSelection is 0, all items are deselected):
07935     if (!additiveSelection)
07936     {
07937       for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); ++i)
07938       {
07939         if (mItems.at(i) != itemSelection && mItems.at(i)->selected() && mItems.at(i)->selectable())
07940         {
07941           mItems.at(i)->setSelected(false);
07942           modified = true;
07943         }
07944       }
07945     }
07946   } else // event == 0, so deselect selectable items
07947   {
07948     for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); ++i)
07949     {
07950       if (mItems.at(i)->selected() && mItems.at(i)->selectable())
07951       {
07952         mItems.at(i)->setSelected(false);
07953         modified = true;
07954       }
07955     }
07956   }
07957   return selectionFound;
07958 }
07959 
07972 bool QCustomPlot::handleAxisSelection(QMouseEvent *event, bool additiveSelection, bool &modified)
07973 {
07974   bool selectionFound = false;
07975   QVector<QCPAxis*> axes = QVector<QCPAxis*>() << xAxis << yAxis << xAxis2 << yAxis2;
07976   for (int i=0; i<axes.size(); ++i)
07977     selectionFound |= axes.at(i)->handleAxisSelection((!selectionFound || additiveSelection) ? event : 0, additiveSelection, modified);
07978   return selectionFound;
07979 }
07980 
07993 bool QCustomPlot::handleTitleSelection(QMouseEvent *event, bool additiveSelection, bool &modified)
07994 {
07995   bool selectionFound = false;
07996   if (event && selectTestTitle(event->pos())) // hit, select title
07997   {
07998     selectionFound = true;
07999     if (!titleSelected() || additiveSelection)
08000     {
08001       setTitleSelected(!titleSelected());
08002       modified = true;
08003     }
08004   } else // no hit or event == 0, deselect title
08005   {
08006     if (titleSelected() && !additiveSelection)
08007     {
08008       setTitleSelected(false);
08009       modified = true;
08010     }
08011   }
08012   return selectionFound;
08013 }
08014 
08021 void QCustomPlot::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
08022 {
08023   // calculate title bounding box:
08024   if (!mTitle.isEmpty())
08025   {
08026     painter->setFont(titleSelected() ? mSelectedTitleFont : mTitleFont);
08027     mTitleBoundingBox = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(mViewport, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, mTitle);
08028   } else
08029     mTitleBoundingBox = QRect();
08030   
08031   // prepare values of ticks and tick strings:
08032   xAxis->setupTickVectors();
08033   yAxis->setupTickVectors();
08034   xAxis2->setupTickVectors();
08035   yAxis2->setupTickVectors();
08036   // set auto margin such that tick/axis labels etc. are not clipped:
08037   if (mAutoMargin)
08038   {
08039     setMargin(yAxis->calculateMargin(),
08040               yAxis2->calculateMargin(),
08041               xAxis2->calculateMargin()+mTitleBoundingBox.height(),
08042               xAxis->calculateMargin());
08043   }
08044   // position legend:
08045   legend->reArrange();
08046   
08047   // draw axis background:
08048   drawAxisBackground(painter);
08049   
08050   // draw all layered objects (grid, axes, plottables, items, legend,...):
08051   for (int layerIndex=0; layerIndex < mLayers.size(); ++layerIndex)
08052   {
08053     QList<QCPLayerable*> layerChildren = mLayers.at(layerIndex)->children();
08054     for (int k=0; k < layerChildren.size(); ++k)
08055     {
08056       QCPLayerable *child = layerChildren.at(k);
08057       if (child->visible())
08058       {
08059         painter->save();
08060         painter->setClipRect(child->clipRect().translated(0, -1));
08061         child->applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
08062         child->draw(painter);
08063         painter->restore();
08064       }
08065     }
08066   }
08067   
08068   // draw title:
08069   if (!mTitle.isEmpty())
08070   {
08071     painter->setFont(titleSelected() ? mSelectedTitleFont : mTitleFont);
08072     painter->setPen(QPen(titleSelected() ? mSelectedTitleColor : mTitleColor));
08073     painter->drawText(mTitleBoundingBox, Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::AlignHCenter, mTitle);
08074   }
08075 }
08076 
08089 void QCustomPlot::drawAxisBackground(QCPPainter *painter)
08090 {
08091   if (!mAxisBackground.isNull())
08092   {
08093     if (mAxisBackgroundScaled)
08094     {
08095       // check whether mScaledAxisBackground needs to be updated:
08096       QSize scaledSize(mAxisBackground.size());
08097       scaledSize.scale(mAxisRect.size(), mAxisBackgroundScaledMode);
08098       if (mScaledAxisBackground.size() != scaledSize)
08099         mScaledAxisBackground = mAxisBackground.scaled(mAxisRect.size(), mAxisBackgroundScaledMode, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
08100       painter->drawPixmap(mAxisRect.topLeft(), mScaledAxisBackground, QRect(0, 0, mAxisRect.width(), mAxisRect.height()) & mScaledAxisBackground.rect());
08101     } else
08102     {
08103       painter->drawPixmap(mAxisRect.topLeft(), mAxisBackground, QRect(0, 0, mAxisRect.width(), mAxisRect.height()));
08104     }
08105   }
08106 }
08107 
08115 void QCustomPlot::updateAxisRect()
08116 {
08117   mAxisRect = mViewport.adjusted(mMarginLeft, mMarginTop, -mMarginRight, -mMarginBottom);
08118   xAxis->setAxisRect(mAxisRect);
08119   yAxis->setAxisRect(mAxisRect);
08120   xAxis2->setAxisRect(mAxisRect);
08121   yAxis2->setAxisRect(mAxisRect);
08122 }
08123 
08128 bool QCustomPlot::selectTestTitle(const QPointF &pos) const
08129 {
08130   return mTitleBoundingBox.contains(pos.toPoint());
08131 }
08132 
08145 bool QCustomPlot::saveRastered(const QString &fileName, int width, int height, double scale, const char *format, int quality)
08146 {
08147   int newWidth, newHeight;
08148   if (width == 0 || height == 0)
08149   {
08150     newWidth = this->width();
08151     newHeight = this->height();
08152   } else
08153   {
08154     newWidth = width;
08155     newHeight = height;
08156   }
08157   int scaledWidth = qRound(scale*newWidth);
08158   int scaledHeight = qRound(scale*newHeight);
08159 
08160   QPixmap pngBuffer(scaledWidth, scaledHeight); // use QPixmap instead of QImage (like live painting buffer), because it supports background transparency (of mColor).
08161   pngBuffer.fill(mColor);
08162   QCPPainter painter(&pngBuffer);
08163   QRect oldViewport = mViewport;
08164   mViewport = QRect(0, 0, newWidth, newHeight);
08165   updateAxisRect();
08166   if (!qFuzzyCompare(scale, 1.0))
08167   {
08168     if (scale > 1.0) // for scale < 1 we always want cosmetic pens where possible, because else lines would disappear
08169     {
08170       painter.setScaledExportMode(true);
08171       painter.setRenderHint(QPainter::NonCosmeticDefaultPen);
08172     }
08173     painter.scale(scale, scale);
08174   }
08175   draw(&painter);
08176   mViewport = oldViewport;
08177   updateAxisRect();
08178   return pngBuffer.save(fileName, format, quality);
08179 }
08180 
08181 
08182 // ================================================================================
08183 // =================== QCPAbstractPlottable
08184 // ================================================================================
08185 
08254 /* start of documentation of pure virtual functions */
08255 
08329 /* end of documentation of pure virtual functions */
08330 /* start of documentation of signals */
08331 
08337 /* end of documentation of signals */
08338 
08352 QCPAbstractPlottable::QCPAbstractPlottable(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
08353   QCPLayerable(keyAxis->parentPlot()),
08354   mName(""),
08355   mAntialiasedFill(true),
08356   mAntialiasedScatters(true),
08357   mAntialiasedErrorBars(false),
08358   mPen(Qt::black),
08359   mSelectedPen(Qt::black),
08360   mBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
08361   mSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush),
08362   mKeyAxis(keyAxis),
08363   mValueAxis(valueAxis),
08364   mSelected(false),
08365   mSelectable(true)
08366 {
08367   if (keyAxis->parentPlot() != valueAxis->parentPlot())
08368     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Parent plot of keyAxis is not the same as that of valueAxis.";
08369   if (keyAxis->orientation() == valueAxis->orientation())
08370     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "keyAxis and valueAxis must be orthogonal to each other.";
08371 }
08372 
08377 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setName(const QString &name)
08378 {
08379   mName = name;
08380 }
08381 
08388 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setAntialiasedFill(bool enabled)
08389 {
08390   mAntialiasedFill = enabled;
08391 }
08392 
08399 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setAntialiasedScatters(bool enabled)
08400 {
08401   mAntialiasedScatters = enabled;
08402 }
08403 
08410 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setAntialiasedErrorBars(bool enabled)
08411 {
08412   mAntialiasedErrorBars = enabled;
08413 }
08414 
08415 
08425 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setPen(const QPen &pen)
08426 {
08427   mPen = pen;
08428 }
08429 
08436 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
08437 {
08438   mSelectedPen = pen;
08439 }
08440 
08450 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
08451 {
08452   mBrush = brush;
08453 }
08454 
08461 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
08462 {
08463   mSelectedBrush = brush;
08464 }
08465 
08477 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setKeyAxis(QCPAxis *axis)
08478 {
08479   mKeyAxis = axis;
08480 }
08481 
08493 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setValueAxis(QCPAxis *axis)
08494 {
08495   mValueAxis = axis;
08496 }
08497 
08507 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelectable(bool selectable)
08508 {
08509   mSelectable = selectable;
08510 }
08511 
08526 void QCPAbstractPlottable::setSelected(bool selected)
08527 {
08528   if (mSelected != selected)
08529   {
08530     mSelected = selected;
08531     emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
08532   }
08533 }
08534 
08546 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleAxes(bool onlyEnlarge) const
08547 {
08548   rescaleKeyAxis(onlyEnlarge);
08549   rescaleValueAxis(onlyEnlarge);
08550 }
08551 
08557 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleKeyAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const
08558 {
08559   SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
08560   if (mKeyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
08561     signDomain = (mKeyAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
08562   
08563   bool validRange;
08564   QCPRange newRange = getKeyRange(validRange, signDomain);
08565   if (validRange)
08566   {
08567     if (onlyEnlarge)
08568     {
08569       if (mKeyAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
08570         newRange.lower = mKeyAxis->range().lower;
08571       if (mKeyAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
08572         newRange.upper = mKeyAxis->range().upper;
08573     }
08574     mKeyAxis->setRange(newRange);
08575   }
08576 }
08577 
08583 void QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleValueAxis(bool onlyEnlarge) const
08584 {
08585   SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
08586   if (mValueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
08587     signDomain = (mValueAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
08588   
08589   bool validRange;
08590   QCPRange newRange = getValueRange(validRange, signDomain);
08591   
08592   if (validRange)
08593   {
08594     if (onlyEnlarge)
08595     {
08596       if (mValueAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
08597         newRange.lower = mValueAxis->range().lower;
08598       if (mValueAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
08599         newRange.upper = mValueAxis->range().upper;
08600     }
08601     mValueAxis->setRange(newRange);
08602   }
08603 }
08604 
08617 bool QCPAbstractPlottable::addToLegend()
08618 {
08619   if (!mParentPlot->legend->hasItemWithPlottable(this))
08620   {
08621     mParentPlot->legend->addItem(new QCPPlottableLegendItem(mParentPlot->legend, this));
08622     return true;
08623   } else
08624     return false;
08625 }
08626 
08637 bool QCPAbstractPlottable::removeFromLegend() const
08638 {
08639   if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *lip = mParentPlot->legend->itemWithPlottable(this))
08640     return mParentPlot->legend->removeItem(lip);
08641   else
08642     return false;
08643 }
08644 
08645 /* inherits documentation from base class */
08646 QRect QCPAbstractPlottable::clipRect() const
08647 {
08648   return mKeyAxis->axisRect() | mValueAxis->axisRect();
08649 }
08650 
08661 void QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key, double value, double &x, double &y) const
08662 {
08663   if (mKeyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
08664   {
08665     x = mKeyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
08666     y = mValueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
08667   } else
08668   {
08669     y = mKeyAxis->coordToPixel(key);
08670     x = mValueAxis->coordToPixel(value);
08671   }
08672 }
08673 
08679 const QPointF QCPAbstractPlottable::coordsToPixels(double key, double value) const
08680 {
08681   if (mKeyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
08682     return QPointF(mKeyAxis->coordToPixel(key), mValueAxis->coordToPixel(value));
08683   else
08684     return QPointF(mValueAxis->coordToPixel(value), mKeyAxis->coordToPixel(key));
08685 }
08686 
08697 void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(double x, double y, double &key, double &value) const
08698 {
08699   if (mKeyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
08700   {
08701     key = mKeyAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
08702     value = mValueAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
08703   } else
08704   {
08705     key = mKeyAxis->pixelToCoord(y);
08706     value = mValueAxis->pixelToCoord(x);
08707   }
08708 }
08709 
08715 void QCPAbstractPlottable::pixelsToCoords(const QPointF &pixelPos, double &key, double &value) const
08716 {
08717   pixelsToCoords(pixelPos.x(), pixelPos.y(), key, value);
08718 }
08719 
08725 QPen QCPAbstractPlottable::mainPen() const
08726 {
08727   return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
08728 }
08729 
08735 QBrush QCPAbstractPlottable::mainBrush() const
08736 {
08737   return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
08738 }
08739 
08752 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
08753 {
08754   applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aePlottables);
08755 }
08756 
08767 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyFillAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
08768 {
08769   applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedFill, QCP::aeFills);
08770 }
08771 
08782 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyScattersAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
08783 {
08784   applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedScatters, QCP::aeScatters);
08785 }
08786 
08797 void QCPAbstractPlottable::applyErrorBarsAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
08798 {
08799   applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiasedErrorBars, QCP::aeErrorBars);
08800 }
08801 
08812 double QCPAbstractPlottable::distSqrToLine(const QPointF &start, const QPointF &end, const QPointF &point) const
08813 {
08814   QVector2D a(start);
08815   QVector2D b(end);
08816   QVector2D p(point);
08817   QVector2D v(b-a);
08818   
08819   double vLengthSqr = v.lengthSquared();
08820   if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vLengthSqr))
08821   {
08822     double mu = QVector2D::dotProduct(p-a, v)/vLengthSqr;
08823     if (mu < 0)
08824       return (a-p).lengthSquared();
08825     else if (mu > 1)
08826       return (b-p).lengthSquared();
08827     else
08828       return ((a + mu*v)-p).lengthSquared();
08829   } else
08830     return (a-p).lengthSquared();
08831 }
08832 
08833 
08834 // ================================================================================
08835 // =================== QCPAbstractLegendItem
08836 // ================================================================================
08837 
08863 /* start documentation of pure virtual functions */
08864 
08879 /* end documentation of pure virtual functions */
08880 /* start of documentation of signals */
08881 
08888 /* end of documentation of signals */
08889 
08894 QCPAbstractLegendItem::QCPAbstractLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent) : 
08895   QObject(parent),
08896   mParentLegend(parent),
08897   mAntialiased(false),
08898   mFont(parent->font()),
08899   mTextColor(parent->textColor()),
08900   mSelectedFont(parent->selectedFont()),
08901   mSelectedTextColor(parent->selectedTextColor()),
08902   mSelectable(true),
08903   mSelected(false)
08904 {
08905 }
08906 
08913 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setAntialiased(bool enabled)
08914 {
08915   mAntialiased = enabled;
08916 }
08917 
08923 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setFont(const QFont &font)
08924 {
08925   mFont = font;
08926 }
08927 
08933 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setTextColor(const QColor &color)
08934 {
08935   mTextColor = color;
08936 }
08937 
08944 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
08945 {
08946   mSelectedFont = font;
08947 }
08948 
08955 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color)
08956 {
08957   mSelectedTextColor = color;
08958 }
08959 
08965 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelectable(bool selectable)
08966 {
08967   mSelectable = selectable;
08968 }
08969 
08979 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::setSelected(bool selected)
08980 {
08981   if (mSelected != selected)
08982   {
08983     mSelected = selected;
08984     emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
08985     mParentLegend->updateSelectionState();
08986   }
08987 }
08988 
08995 void QCPAbstractLegendItem::applyAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
08996 {
08997   if (mParentLegend->mParentPlot->notAntialiasedElements().testFlag(QCP::aeLegendItems))
08998     painter->setAntialiasing(false);
08999   else if (mParentLegend->mParentPlot->antialiasedElements().testFlag(QCP::aeLegendItems))
09000     painter->setAntialiasing(true);
09001   else
09002     painter->setAntialiasing(mAntialiased);
09003 }
09004 
09005 
09006 // ================================================================================
09007 // =================== QCPPlottableLegendItem
09008 // ================================================================================
09039 QCPPlottableLegendItem::QCPPlottableLegendItem(QCPLegend *parent, QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) :
09040   QCPAbstractLegendItem(parent),
09041   mPlottable(plottable),
09042   mTextWrap(false)
09043 {
09044 }
09045 
09054 void QCPPlottableLegendItem::setTextWrap(bool wrap)
09055 {
09056   mTextWrap = wrap;
09057 }
09058 
09064 QPen QCPPlottableLegendItem::getIconBorderPen() const
09065 {
09066   return mSelected ? mParentLegend->selectedIconBorderPen() : mParentLegend->iconBorderPen();
09067 }
09068 
09074 QColor QCPPlottableLegendItem::getTextColor() const
09075 {
09076   return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
09077 }
09078 
09084 QFont QCPPlottableLegendItem::getFont() const
09085 {
09086   return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
09087 }
09088 
09099 void QCPPlottableLegendItem::draw(QCPPainter *painter, const QRect &rect) const
09100 {
09101   if (!mPlottable) return;
09102   painter->setFont(getFont());
09103   painter->setPen(QPen(getTextColor()));
09104   int iconTextPadding = mParentLegend->iconTextPadding();
09105   QSize iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
09106   QRect textRect;
09107   QRect iconRect(rect.topLeft(), iconSize);
09108   if (mTextWrap)
09109   {
09110     // take width from rect since our text should wrap there (only icon must fit at least):
09111     textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, rect.width()-iconTextPadding-iconSize.width(), rect.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::TextWordWrap, mPlottable->name());
09112     if (textRect.height() < iconSize.height()) // text smaller than icon, center text vertically in icon height
09113     {
09114       painter->drawText(rect.x()+iconSize.width()+iconTextPadding, rect.y(), rect.width()-iconTextPadding-iconSize.width(), iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::TextWordWrap, mPlottable->name());
09115     } else // text bigger than icon, position top of text with top of icon
09116     {
09117       painter->drawText(rect.x()+iconSize.width()+iconTextPadding, rect.y(), rect.width()-iconTextPadding-iconSize.width(), textRect.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::TextWordWrap, mPlottable->name());
09118     }
09119   } else
09120   {
09121     // text can't wrap (except with explicit newlines), center at current item size (icon size)
09122     textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, rect.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
09123     if (textRect.height() < iconSize.height()) // text smaller than icon, center text vertically in icon height
09124     {
09125       painter->drawText(rect.x()+iconSize.width()+iconTextPadding, rect.y(), rect.width(), iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
09126     } else // text bigger than icon, position top of text with top of icon
09127     {
09128       painter->drawText(rect.x()+iconSize.width()+iconTextPadding, rect.y(), rect.width(), textRect.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
09129     }
09130   }
09131   // draw icon:
09132   painter->save();
09133   painter->setClipRect(iconRect, Qt::IntersectClip);
09134   mPlottable->drawLegendIcon(painter, iconRect);
09135   painter->restore();
09136   // draw icon border:
09137   if (getIconBorderPen().style() != Qt::NoPen)
09138   {
09139     painter->setPen(getIconBorderPen());
09140     painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
09141     painter->drawRect(iconRect);
09142   }
09143 }
09144 
09156 QSize QCPPlottableLegendItem::size(const QSize &targetSize) const
09157 {
09158   if (!mPlottable) return QSize();
09159   QSize result(0, 0);
09160   QRect textRect;
09161   QFontMetrics fontMetrics(getFont());
09162   int iconTextPadding = mParentLegend->iconTextPadding();
09163   QSize iconSize = mParentLegend->iconSize();
09164   if (mTextWrap)
09165   {
09166     // take width from targetSize since our text can wrap (Only icon must fit at least):
09167     textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, targetSize.width()-iconTextPadding-iconSize.width(), iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip | Qt::TextWordWrap, mPlottable->name());
09168   } else
09169   {
09170     // text can't wrap (except with explicit newlines), center at current item size (icon size)
09171     textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, iconSize.height(), Qt::TextDontClip, mPlottable->name());
09172   }
09173   result.setWidth(iconSize.width() + mParentLegend->iconTextPadding() + textRect.width());
09174   result.setHeight(qMax(textRect.height(), iconSize.height()));
09175   return result;
09176 }
09177 
09178 // ================================================================================
09179 // =================== QCPCurve
09180 // ================================================================================
09215 QCPCurve::QCPCurve(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
09216   QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis)
09217 {
09218   mData = new QCPCurveDataMap;
09219   mPen.setColor(Qt::blue);
09220   mPen.setStyle(Qt::SolidLine);
09221   mBrush.setColor(Qt::blue);
09222   mBrush.setStyle(Qt::NoBrush);
09223   mSelectedPen = mPen;
09224   mSelectedPen.setWidthF(2.5);
09225   mSelectedPen.setColor(QColor(80, 80, 255)); // lighter than Qt::blue of mPen
09226   mSelectedBrush = mBrush;
09227   
09228   setScatterSize(6);
09229   setScatterStyle(QCP::ssNone);
09230   setLineStyle(lsLine);
09231 }
09232 
09233 QCPCurve::~QCPCurve()
09234 {
09235   delete mData;
09236 }
09237 
09245 void QCPCurve::setData(QCPCurveDataMap *data, bool copy)
09246 {
09247   if (copy)
09248   {
09249     *mData = *data;
09250   } else
09251   {
09252     delete mData;
09253     mData = data;
09254   }
09255 }
09256 
09263 void QCPCurve::setData(const QVector<double> &t, const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value)
09264 {
09265   mData->clear();
09266   int n = t.size();
09267   n = qMin(n, key.size());
09268   n = qMin(n, value.size());
09269   QCPCurveData newData;
09270   for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
09271   {
09272     newData.t = t[i];
09273     newData.key = key[i];
09274     newData.value = value[i];
09275     mData->insertMulti(newData.t, newData);
09276   }
09277 }
09278 
09284 void QCPCurve::setData(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value)
09285 {
09286   mData->clear();
09287   int n = key.size();
09288   n = qMin(n, value.size());
09289   QCPCurveData newData;
09290   for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
09291   {
09292     newData.t = i; // no t vector given, so we assign t the index of the key/value pair
09293     newData.key = key[i];
09294     newData.value = value[i];
09295     mData->insertMulti(newData.t, newData);
09296   }
09297 }
09298 
09304 void QCPCurve::setScatterStyle(QCP::ScatterStyle style)
09305 {
09306   mScatterStyle = style;
09307 }
09308 
09316 void QCPCurve::setScatterSize(double size)
09317 {
09318   mScatterSize = size;
09319 }
09320 
09327 void QCPCurve::setScatterPixmap(const QPixmap &pixmap)
09328 {
09329   mScatterPixmap = pixmap;
09330 }
09331 
09339 void QCPCurve::setLineStyle(QCPCurve::LineStyle style)
09340 {
09341   mLineStyle = style;
09342 }
09343 
09348 void QCPCurve::addData(const QCPCurveDataMap &dataMap)
09349 {
09350   mData->unite(dataMap);
09351 }
09352 
09357 void QCPCurve::addData(const QCPCurveData &data)
09358 {
09359   mData->insertMulti(data.t, data);
09360 }
09361 
09366 void QCPCurve::addData(double t, double key, double value)
09367 {
09368   QCPCurveData newData;
09369   newData.t = t;
09370   newData.key = key;
09371   newData.value = value;
09372   mData->insertMulti(newData.t, newData);
09373 }
09374 
09383 void QCPCurve::addData(double key, double value)
09384 {
09385   QCPCurveData newData;
09386   if (!mData->isEmpty())
09387     newData.t = (mData->constEnd()-1).key()+1;
09388   else
09389     newData.t = 0;
09390   newData.key = key;
09391   newData.value = value;
09392   mData->insertMulti(newData.t, newData);
09393 }
09394 
09399 void QCPCurve::addData(const QVector<double> &ts, const QVector<double> &keys, const QVector<double> &values)
09400 {
09401   int n = ts.size();
09402   n = qMin(n, keys.size());
09403   n = qMin(n, values.size());
09404   QCPCurveData newData;
09405   for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
09406   {
09407     newData.t = ts[i];
09408     newData.key = keys[i];
09409     newData.value = values[i];
09410     mData->insertMulti(newData.t, newData);
09411   }
09412 }
09413 
09418 void QCPCurve::removeDataBefore(double t)
09419 {
09420   QCPCurveDataMap::iterator it = mData->begin();
09421   while (it != mData->end() && it.key() < t)
09422     it = mData->erase(it);
09423 }
09424 
09429 void QCPCurve::removeDataAfter(double t)
09430 {
09431   if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
09432   QCPCurveDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(t);
09433   while (it != mData->end())
09434     it = mData->erase(it);
09435 }
09436 
09444 void QCPCurve::removeData(double fromt, double tot)
09445 {
09446   if (fromt >= tot || mData->isEmpty()) return;
09447   QCPCurveDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(fromt);
09448   QCPCurveDataMap::iterator itEnd = mData->upperBound(tot);
09449   while (it != itEnd)
09450     it = mData->erase(it);
09451 }
09452 
09462 void QCPCurve::removeData(double t)
09463 {
09464   mData->remove(t);
09465 }
09466 
09471 void QCPCurve::clearData()
09472 {
09473   mData->clear();
09474 }
09475 
09476 /* inherits documentation from base class */
09477 double QCPCurve::selectTest(const QPointF &pos) const
09478 {
09479   if (mData->isEmpty() || !mVisible)
09480     return -1;
09481   
09482   return pointDistance(pos);
09483 }
09484 
09485 /* inherits documentation from base class */
09486 void QCPCurve::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
09487 {
09488   if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
09489   
09490   // allocate line vector:
09491   QVector<QPointF> *lineData = new QVector<QPointF>;
09492   // fill with curve data:
09493   getCurveData(lineData);
09494   // draw curve fill:
09495   if (mainBrush().style() != Qt::NoBrush && mainBrush().color().alpha() != 0)
09496   {
09497     applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
09498     painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
09499     painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
09500     painter->drawPolygon(QPolygonF(*lineData));
09501   }
09502   // draw curve line:
09503   if (mLineStyle != lsNone && mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0)
09504   {
09505     applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
09506     painter->setPen(mainPen());
09507     painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
09508     // if drawing solid line and not in PDF, use much faster line drawing instead of polyline:
09509     if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phFastPolylines) &&
09510         painter->pen().style() == Qt::SolidLine &&
09511         !painter->pdfExportMode())
09512     {
09513       for (int i=1; i<lineData->size(); ++i)
09514         painter->drawLine(lineData->at(i-1), lineData->at(i));
09515     } else
09516     {  
09517       painter->drawPolyline(QPolygonF(*lineData));
09518     }
09519   }
09520   // draw scatters:
09521   if (mScatterStyle != QCP::ssNone)
09522     drawScatterPlot(painter, lineData);
09523   // free allocated line data:
09524   delete lineData;
09525 }
09526 
09527 /* inherits documentation from base class */
09528 void QCPCurve::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRect &rect) const
09529 {
09530   // draw fill:
09531   if (mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
09532   {
09533     applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
09534     painter->fillRect(QRectF(rect.left(), rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0, rect.width(), rect.height()/3.0), mBrush);
09535   }
09536   // draw line vertically centered:
09537   if (mLineStyle != lsNone)
09538   {
09539     applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
09540     painter->setPen(mPen);
09541     painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.left(), rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0, rect.right()+5, rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0)); // +5 on x2 else last segment is missing from dashed/dotted pens
09542   }
09543   // draw scatter symbol:
09544   if (mScatterStyle != QCP::ssNone)
09545   {
09546     if (mScatterStyle == QCP::ssPixmap && (mScatterPixmap.size().width() > rect.width() || mScatterPixmap.size().height() > rect.height()))
09547     {
09548       // handle pixmap scatters that are larger than legend icon rect separately.
09549       // We resize them and draw them manually, instead of calling drawScatter:
09550       QSize newSize = mScatterPixmap.size();
09551       newSize.scale(rect.size(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio);
09552       QRect targetRect;
09553       targetRect.setSize(newSize);
09554       targetRect.moveCenter(rect.center());
09555       bool smoothBackup = painter->testRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform);
09556       painter->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, true);
09557       painter->drawPixmap(targetRect, mScatterPixmap);
09558       painter->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, smoothBackup);
09559     } else
09560     {
09561       applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
09562       painter->setPen(mPen);
09563       painter->drawScatter(QRectF(rect).center().x(), QRectF(rect).center().y(), mScatterSize, mScatterStyle);
09564     }
09565   }
09566 }
09567 
09573 void QCPCurve::drawScatterPlot(QCPPainter *painter, const QVector<QPointF> *pointData) const
09574 {
09575   // draw scatter point symbols:
09576   applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
09577   painter->setPen(mainPen());
09578   painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
09579   painter->setScatterPixmap(mScatterPixmap);
09580   for (int i=0; i<pointData->size(); ++i)
09581     painter->drawScatter(pointData->at(i).x(), pointData->at(i).y(), mScatterSize, mScatterStyle);
09582 }
09583 
09590 void QCPCurve::getCurveData(QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
09591 {
09592   /* Extended sides of axis rect R divide space into 9 regions:
09593      1__|_4_|__7  
09594      2__|_R_|__8
09595      3  | 6 |  9 
09596      General idea: If the two points of a line segment are in the same region (that is not R), the line segment corner is removed.
09597      Curves outside R become straight lines closely outside of R which greatly reduces drawing time, yet keeps the look of lines and
09598      fills inside R consistent.
09599      The region R has index 5.
09600   */
09601   lineData->reserve(mData->size());
09602   QCPCurveDataMap::const_iterator it;
09603   int lastRegion = 5;
09604   int currentRegion = 5;
09605   double RLeft = mKeyAxis->range().lower;
09606   double RRight = mKeyAxis->range().upper;
09607   double RBottom = mValueAxis->range().lower;
09608   double RTop = mValueAxis->range().upper;
09609   double x, y; // current key/value
09610   bool addedLastAlready = true;
09611   bool firstPoint = true; // first point must always be drawn, to make sure fill works correctly
09612   for (it = mData->constBegin(); it != mData->constEnd(); ++it)
09613   {
09614     x = it.value().key;
09615     y = it.value().value;
09616     // determine current region:
09617     if (x < RLeft) // region 123
09618     {
09619       if (y > RTop)
09620         currentRegion = 1;
09621       else if (y < RBottom)
09622         currentRegion = 3;
09623       else
09624         currentRegion = 2;
09625     } else if (x > RRight) // region 789
09626     {
09627       if (y > RTop)
09628         currentRegion = 7;
09629       else if (y < RBottom)
09630         currentRegion = 9;
09631       else
09632         currentRegion = 8;
09633     } else // region 456
09634     {
09635       if (y > RTop)
09636         currentRegion = 4;
09637       else if (y < RBottom)
09638         currentRegion = 6;
09639       else
09640         currentRegion = 5;
09641     }
09642     
09643     /*
09644       Watch out, the next part is very tricky. It modifies the curve such that it seems like the
09645       whole thing is still drawn, but actually the points outside the axisRect are simplified
09646       ("optimized") greatly. There are some subtle special cases when line segments are large and
09647       thereby each subsequent point may be in a different region or even skip some.
09648     */
09649     // determine whether to keep current point:
09650     if (currentRegion == 5 || (firstPoint && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)) // current is in R, add current and last if it wasn't added already
09651     {
09652       if (!addedLastAlready) // in case curve just entered R, make sure the last point outside R is also drawn correctly
09653         lineData->append(coordsToPixels((it-1).value().key, (it-1).value().value)); // add last point to vector
09654       else if (lastRegion != 5) // added last already. If that's the case, we probably added it at optimized position. So go back and make sure it's at original position (else the angle changes under which this segment enters R)
09655       {
09656         if (!firstPoint) // because on firstPoint, currentRegion is 5 and addedLastAlready is true, although there is no last point
09657           lineData->replace(lineData->size()-1, coordsToPixels((it-1).value().key, (it-1).value().value));
09658       }
09659       lineData->append(coordsToPixels(it.value().key, it.value().value)); // add current point to vector
09660       addedLastAlready = true; // so in next iteration, we don't add this point twice
09661     } else if (currentRegion != lastRegion) // changed region, add current and last if not added already
09662     {
09663       // using outsideCoordsToPixels instead of coorsToPixels for optimized point placement (places points just outside axisRect instead of potentially far away)
09664       
09665       // if we're coming from R or we skip diagonally over the corner regions (so line might still be visible in R), we can't place points optimized
09666       if (lastRegion == 5 || // coming from R
09667           ((lastRegion==2 && currentRegion==4) || (lastRegion==4 && currentRegion==2)) || // skip top left diagonal
09668           ((lastRegion==4 && currentRegion==8) || (lastRegion==8 && currentRegion==4)) || // skip top right diagonal
09669           ((lastRegion==8 && currentRegion==6) || (lastRegion==6 && currentRegion==8)) || // skip bottom right diagonal
09670           ((lastRegion==6 && currentRegion==2) || (lastRegion==2 && currentRegion==6))    // skip bottom left diagonal
09671           )
09672       {
09673         // always add last point if not added already, original:
09674         if (!addedLastAlready)
09675           lineData->append(coordsToPixels((it-1).value().key, (it-1).value().value));
09676         // add current point, original:
09677         lineData->append(coordsToPixels(it.value().key, it.value().value));
09678       } else // no special case that forbids optimized point placement, so do it:
09679       {
09680         // always add last point if not added already, optimized:
09681         if (!addedLastAlready)
09682           lineData->append(outsideCoordsToPixels((it-1).value().key, (it-1).value().value, currentRegion));
09683         // add current point, optimized:
09684         lineData->append(outsideCoordsToPixels(it.value().key, it.value().value, currentRegion));
09685       }
09686       addedLastAlready = true; // so that if next point enters 5, or crosses another region boundary, we don't add this point twice
09687     } else // neither in R, nor crossed a region boundary, skip current point
09688     {
09689       addedLastAlready = false;
09690     }
09691     lastRegion = currentRegion;
09692     firstPoint = false;
09693   }
09694   // If curve ends outside R, we want to add very last point so the fill looks like it should when the curve started inside R:
09695   if (lastRegion != 5 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && !mData->isEmpty())
09696     lineData->append(coordsToPixels((mData->constEnd()-1).value().key, (mData->constEnd()-1).value().value));
09697 }
09698 
09705 double QCPCurve::pointDistance(const QPointF &pixelPoint) const
09706 {
09707   if (mData->isEmpty())
09708   {
09709     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "requested point distance on curve" << mName << "without data";
09710     return 500;
09711   }
09712   if (mData->size() == 1)
09713   {
09714     QPointF dataPoint = coordsToPixels(mData->constBegin().key(), mData->constBegin().value().value);
09715     return QVector2D(dataPoint-pixelPoint).length();
09716   }
09717   
09718   // calculate minimum distance to line segments:
09719   QVector<QPointF> *lineData = new QVector<QPointF>;
09720   getCurveData(lineData);
09721   double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
09722   for (int i=0; i<lineData->size()-1; ++i)
09723   {
09724     double currentDistSqr = distSqrToLine(lineData->at(i), lineData->at(i+1), pixelPoint);
09725     if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
09726       minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
09727   }
09728   delete lineData;
09729   return sqrt(minDistSqr);
09730 }
09731 
09742 QPointF QCPCurve::outsideCoordsToPixels(double key, double value, int region) const
09743 {
09744   int margin = 10;
09745   QRect axisRect = mKeyAxis->axisRect() | mValueAxis->axisRect();
09746   QPointF result = coordsToPixels(key, value);
09747   switch (region)
09748   {
09749     case 2: result.setX(axisRect.left()-margin); break; // left
09750     case 8: result.setX(axisRect.right()+margin); break; // right
09751     case 4: result.setY(axisRect.top()-margin); break; // top
09752     case 6: result.setY(axisRect.bottom()+margin); break; // bottom
09753     case 1: result.setX(axisRect.left()-margin);
09754             result.setY(axisRect.top()-margin); break; // top left
09755     case 7: result.setX(axisRect.right()+margin);
09756             result.setY(axisRect.top()-margin); break; // top right
09757     case 9: result.setX(axisRect.right()+margin);
09758             result.setY(axisRect.bottom()+margin); break; // bottom right
09759     case 3: result.setX(axisRect.left()-margin);
09760             result.setY(axisRect.bottom()+margin); break; // bottom left
09761   }
09762   return result;
09763 }
09764 
09765 /* inherits documentation from base class */
09766 QCPRange QCPCurve::getKeyRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
09767 {
09768   QCPRange range;
09769   bool haveLower = false;
09770   bool haveUpper = false;
09771   
09772   double current;
09773   
09774   QCPCurveDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
09775   while (it != mData->constEnd())
09776   {
09777     current = it.value().key;
09778     if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0))
09779     {
09780       if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
09781       {
09782         range.lower = current;
09783         haveLower = true;
09784       }
09785       if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
09786       {
09787         range.upper = current;
09788         haveUpper = true;
09789       }
09790     }
09791     ++it;
09792   }
09793   
09794   validRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
09795   return range;
09796 }
09797 
09798 /* inherits documentation from base class */
09799 QCPRange QCPCurve::getValueRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
09800 {
09801   QCPRange range;
09802   bool haveLower = false;
09803   bool haveUpper = false;
09804   
09805   double current;
09806   
09807   QCPCurveDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
09808   while (it != mData->constEnd())
09809   {
09810     current = it.value().value;
09811     if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0))
09812     {
09813       if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
09814       {
09815         range.lower = current;
09816         haveLower = true;
09817       }
09818       if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
09819       {
09820         range.upper = current;
09821         haveUpper = true;
09822       }
09823     }
09824     ++it;
09825   }
09826   
09827   validRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
09828   return range;
09829 }
09830 
09831 // ================================================================================
09832 // =================== QCPBars
09833 // ================================================================================
09888 QCPBars::QCPBars(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
09889   QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis),
09890   mBarBelow(0),
09891   mBarAbove(0)
09892 {
09893   mData = new QCPBarDataMap;
09894   mPen.setColor(Qt::blue);
09895   mPen.setStyle(Qt::SolidLine);
09896   mBrush.setColor(QColor(40, 50, 255, 30));
09897   mBrush.setStyle(Qt::SolidPattern);
09898   mSelectedPen = mPen;
09899   mSelectedPen.setWidthF(2.5);
09900   mSelectedPen.setColor(QColor(80, 80, 255)); // lighter than Qt::blue of mPen
09901   mSelectedBrush = mBrush;
09902   
09903   mWidth = 0.75;
09904 }
09905 
09906 QCPBars::~QCPBars()
09907 {
09908   if (mBarBelow || mBarAbove)
09909     connectBars(mBarBelow, mBarAbove); // take this bar out of any stacking
09910   delete mData;
09911 }
09912 
09916 void QCPBars::setWidth(double width)
09917 {
09918   mWidth = width;
09919 }
09920 
09928 void QCPBars::setData(QCPBarDataMap *data, bool copy)
09929 {
09930   if (copy)
09931   {
09932     *mData = *data;
09933   } else
09934   {
09935     delete mData;
09936     mData = data;
09937   }
09938 }
09939 
09946 void QCPBars::setData(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value)
09947 {
09948   mData->clear();
09949   int n = key.size();
09950   n = qMin(n, value.size());
09951   QCPBarData newData;
09952   for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
09953   {
09954     newData.key = key[i];
09955     newData.value = value[i];
09956     mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
09957   }
09958 }
09959 
09974 void QCPBars::moveBelow(QCPBars *bars)
09975 {
09976   if (bars == this) return;
09977   if (bars->keyAxis() != mKeyAxis || bars->valueAxis() != mValueAxis)
09978   {
09979     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed QCPBars* doesn't have same key and value axis as this QCPBars";
09980     return;
09981   }
09982   // remove from stacking:
09983   connectBars(mBarBelow, mBarAbove); // Note: also works if one (or both) of them is 0
09984   // if new bar given, insert this bar below it:
09985   if (bars)
09986   {
09987     if (bars->mBarBelow)
09988       connectBars(bars->mBarBelow, this);
09989     connectBars(this, bars);
09990   }
09991 }
09992 
10007 void QCPBars::moveAbove(QCPBars *bars)
10008 {
10009   if (bars == this) return;
10010   if (bars && (bars->keyAxis() != mKeyAxis || bars->valueAxis() != mValueAxis))
10011   {
10012     qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "passed QCPBars* doesn't have same key and value axis as this QCPBars";
10013     return;
10014   }
10015   // remove from stacking:
10016   connectBars(mBarBelow, mBarAbove); // Note: also works if one (or both) of them is 0
10017   // if new bar given, insert this bar above it:
10018   if (bars)
10019   {
10020     if (bars->mBarAbove)
10021       connectBars(this, bars->mBarAbove);
10022     connectBars(bars, this);
10023   }
10024 }
10025 
10030 void QCPBars::addData(const QCPBarDataMap &dataMap)
10031 {
10032   mData->unite(dataMap);
10033 }
10034 
10039 void QCPBars::addData(const QCPBarData &data)
10040 {
10041   mData->insertMulti(data.key, data);
10042 }
10043 
10048 void QCPBars::addData(double key, double value)
10049 {
10050   QCPBarData newData;
10051   newData.key = key;
10052   newData.value = value;
10053   mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
10054 }
10055 
10060 void QCPBars::addData(const QVector<double> &keys, const QVector<double> &values)
10061 {
10062   int n = keys.size();
10063   n = qMin(n, values.size());
10064   QCPBarData newData;
10065   for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
10066   {
10067     newData.key = keys[i];
10068     newData.value = values[i];
10069     mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
10070   }
10071 }
10072 
10077 void QCPBars::removeDataBefore(double key)
10078 {
10079   QCPBarDataMap::iterator it = mData->begin();
10080   while (it != mData->end() && it.key() < key)
10081     it = mData->erase(it);
10082 }
10083 
10088 void QCPBars::removeDataAfter(double key)
10089 {
10090   if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
10091   QCPBarDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(key);
10092   while (it != mData->end())
10093     it = mData->erase(it);
10094 }
10095 
10103 void QCPBars::removeData(double fromKey, double toKey)
10104 {
10105   if (fromKey >= toKey || mData->isEmpty()) return;
10106   QCPBarDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(fromKey);
10107   QCPBarDataMap::iterator itEnd = mData->upperBound(toKey);
10108   while (it != itEnd)
10109     it = mData->erase(it);
10110 }
10111 
10120 void QCPBars::removeData(double key)
10121 {
10122   mData->remove(key);
10123 }
10124 
10129 void QCPBars::clearData()
10130 {
10131   mData->clear();
10132 }
10133 
10134 /* inherits documentation from base class */
10135 double QCPBars::selectTest(const QPointF &pos) const
10136 {
10137   QCPBarDataMap::ConstIterator it;
10138   double posKey, posValue;
10139   pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
10140   for (it = mData->constBegin(); it != mData->constEnd(); ++it)
10141   {
10142     double baseValue = getBaseValue(it.key(), it.value().value >=0);
10143     QCPRange keyRange(it.key()-mWidth*0.5, it.key()+mWidth*0.5);
10144     QCPRange valueRange(baseValue, baseValue+it.value().value);
10145     if (keyRange.contains(posKey) && valueRange.contains(posValue))
10146       return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
10147   }
10148   return -1;
10149 }
10150 
10151 /* inherits documentation from base class */
10152 void QCPBars::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
10153 {
10154   if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
10155   
10156   QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it;
10157   for (it = mData->constBegin(); it != mData->constEnd(); ++it)
10158   {
10159     if (it.key()+mWidth*0.5 < mKeyAxis->range().lower || it.key()-mWidth*0.5 > mKeyAxis->range().upper)
10160       continue;
10161     QPolygonF barPolygon = getBarPolygon(it.key(), it.value().value);
10162     // draw bar fill:
10163     if (mainBrush().style() != Qt::NoBrush && mainBrush().color().alpha() != 0)
10164     {
10165       applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
10166       painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
10167       painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
10168       painter->drawPolygon(barPolygon);
10169     }
10170     // draw bar line:
10171     if (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0)
10172     {
10173       applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
10174       painter->setPen(mainPen());
10175       painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
10176       painter->drawPolyline(barPolygon);
10177     }
10178   }
10179 }
10180 
10181 /* inherits documentation from base class */
10182 void QCPBars::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRect &rect) const
10183 {
10184   // draw filled rect:
10185   applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
10186   painter->setBrush(mBrush);
10187   painter->setPen(mPen);
10188   QRectF r = QRectF(0, 0, rect.width()*0.67, rect.height()*0.67);
10189   r.moveCenter(rect.center());
10190   painter->drawRect(r);
10191 }
10192 
10198 QPolygonF QCPBars::getBarPolygon(double key, double value) const
10199 {
10200   QPolygonF result;
10201   double baseValue = getBaseValue(key, value >= 0);
10202   result << coordsToPixels(key-mWidth*0.5, baseValue);
10203   result << coordsToPixels(key-mWidth*0.5, baseValue+value);
10204   result << coordsToPixels(key+mWidth*0.5, baseValue+value);
10205   result << coordsToPixels(key+mWidth*0.5, baseValue);
10206   return result;
10207 }
10208 
10218 double QCPBars::getBaseValue(double key, bool positive) const
10219 {
10220   if (mBarBelow)
10221   {
10222     double max = 0;
10223     // find bars of mBarBelow that are approximately at key and find largest one:
10224     QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = mBarBelow->mData->lowerBound(key-mWidth*0.1);
10225     QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator itEnd = mBarBelow->mData->upperBound(key+mWidth*0.1);
10226     while (it != itEnd)
10227     {
10228       if ((positive && it.value().value > max) ||
10229           (!positive && it.value().value < max))
10230         max = it.value().value;
10231       ++it;
10232     }
10233     // recurse down the bar-stack to find the total height:
10234     return max + mBarBelow->getBaseValue(key, positive);
10235   } else
10236     return 0;
10237 }
10238 
10247 void QCPBars::connectBars(QCPBars *lower, QCPBars *upper)
10248 {
10249   if (!lower && !upper) return;
10250   
10251   if (!lower) // disconnect upper at bottom
10252   {
10253     // disconnect old bar below upper:
10254     if (upper->mBarBelow && upper->mBarBelow->mBarAbove == upper)
10255       upper->mBarBelow->mBarAbove = 0;
10256     upper->mBarBelow = 0;
10257   } else if (!upper) // disconnect lower at top
10258   {
10259     // disconnect old bar above lower:
10260     if (lower->mBarAbove && lower->mBarAbove->mBarBelow == lower)
10261       lower->mBarAbove->mBarBelow = 0;
10262     lower->mBarAbove = 0;
10263   } else // connect lower and upper
10264   {
10265     // disconnect old bar above lower:
10266     if (lower->mBarAbove && lower->mBarAbove->mBarBelow == lower)
10267       lower->mBarAbove->mBarBelow = 0;
10268     // disconnect old bar below upper:
10269     if (upper->mBarBelow && upper->mBarBelow->mBarAbove == upper)
10270       upper->mBarBelow->mBarAbove = 0;
10271     lower->mBarAbove = upper;
10272     upper->mBarBelow = lower;
10273   }
10274 }
10275 
10276 /* inherits documentation from base class */
10277 QCPRange QCPBars::getKeyRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
10278 {
10279   QCPRange range;
10280   bool haveLower = false;
10281   bool haveUpper = false;
10282   
10283   double current;
10284   double barWidthHalf = mWidth*0.5;
10285   QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
10286   while (it != mData->constEnd())
10287   {
10288     current = it.value().key;
10289     if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current+barWidthHalf < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current-barWidthHalf > 0))
10290     {
10291       if (current-barWidthHalf < range.lower || !haveLower)
10292       {
10293         range.lower = current-barWidthHalf;
10294         haveLower = true;
10295       }
10296       if (current+barWidthHalf > range.upper || !haveUpper)
10297       {
10298         range.upper = current+barWidthHalf;
10299         haveUpper = true;
10300       }
10301     }
10302     ++it;
10303   }
10304   
10305   validRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
10306   return range;
10307 }
10308 
10309 /* inherits documentation from base class */
10310 QCPRange QCPBars::getValueRange(bool &validRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
10311 {
10312   QCPRange range;
10313   bool haveLower = true; // set to true, because 0 should always be visible in bar charts
10314   bool haveUpper = true; // set to true, because 0 should always be visible in bar charts
10315   
10316   double current;
10317   
10318   QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
10319   while (it != mData->constEnd())
10320   {
10321     current = it.value().value + getBaseValue(it.value().key, it.value().value >= 0);
10322     if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0))
10323     {
